I noticed a difference in the brightness of my skin after the first couple applications. Will def recommend for anyone on the same glass skin journey I am

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

Took it off after a few minutes, never using this product again. Too bad its also past the 60 days return policy since I was trying out other skincare products. Waste of money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this serum so much for my hyperpigmation dark spots sun spot acne and my roseca

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this. I bought the smaller one initially to try it out and was pleasantly surprised with the results. I definitely saw a difference on how lighter my scars looked post using. Already repurchased the bigger tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works, but I had to use it in moderation. The first 3 weeks I definitely noticed a difference in brightness. I had two bad scars from nose piercings; the oldest scar cleared up a lot faster than the newer one. However after seeing how quickly it started to clear my scarring up I began to apply it all over my face and broke out. It’s better to apply only on certain scars vs the entire face. Not sure if I will purchase again but it definitely does work, it’ll also break you out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the smell is awful, only used 3 times because it says to use once then after a week you can work up to daily use but i can’t do the smell at all, it’s worse than bleach honestly; idk if it helped my skin but i know results were little to none

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using it for about month I a brown skinned and have alot of scarring from pimples and I've definitely seen some lightening of scars. It's happening slowly, it's not magic but it works. I'd buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overly hyped product.. I tolerated the smell of this product for over two months while hoping it would work but unfortunately it wasn't meant for me as I saw no difference in my skin at all and I believe there are cheaper options out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

You’ll get more use out of this on the body than on your face in my opinion, it may even break you out on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews, I thought, there’s no way this product smells THAT bad… But oh, IT DOES. Smells like rotten gasoline. Truly shocked at how bad it smells. The product does work but I don’t think it’s worth it for the smell. It’s a bit unbearable. Disappointing for Topicals because their mask is amazing and so I was hoping for something similar with this serum. Oh well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum faded my hyperpigmentation considerably over the course of 2 months. I’ve found that consistency and patience are key when using this! It’s also been amazing with overall skin texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hoped that the other reviews about the smell were being dramatic but this truly smells awful. If I knew what burning skin smelt like I'd imagine this would be it. I'm so glad I got the mini because I dread using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful for hyperpigmentation. I have been using this product for a couple weeks and I have seen a drastic improvement in my skin.

reviews.review_title: will always have this in my kit!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my second tube of this, and honestly I'll always have it in my kit. I will start off by saying, the smell is not good. but that does not bother me, but I know it can be off-putting to others. but this stuff works! so I can get past the smell. I use this on my dark spots, and there are times where I have a spot appearing in the same area as some of my dark spots. I notice that when I apply it, it stops that spot in its tracks, and it makes it shrink and go away ! I love this stuff! the packaging is not my favorite, it tends to continuously ooze out, but I keep mine in my skincare fridge and it seems to help a bit. would love if the packing was different, then it would be perfect all around! give it a try!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used the glow recipe vitamin C treatment, but there was no change after my second bottle. So, I switched to topicals faded serum. I have seen a difference after using it for three weeks. The first time I used it, the fragrance was pungent and stinky. The smell was hard for me to bear it. Other than this product is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I have noticed my skin is much brighter and it gives a nice glow. However, it smells absolutely terrible. I don't know if I'll use it again because of the smell

reviews.review_title: working in less than a month
reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s not even been a month and I can already see my scar has been getting lighter I pacifically got this product because I had a scar in the middle of my face that was so dark and horrendous that I needed it gone by the end of summer  Usually I use ordinary for my scars but I wanted some thing that would maybe work quicker this definitely does the trick it hasn’t even been a month and I can see it fading away ordinary would take about 3/4 months The only downside is the product kind of smells weird but honestly with the way it working idccc I don’t use it on my whole face because I scared I might break out but I haven’t broken out yet I would just say put it directly on the dark spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I use it almost everyday now. I stopped for a little because my skin was sensitive after a facial. But I realized that this product does not sensitize my skin. If anything, it feels softer and smoothers and more hydrated after. I put it on almost every night and the next morning I wake up so glowy! I even used it under my gentle retinol last night expecting to wake up with some dry patches and there was none! It’s been working well for my lighter acne scars and I’m assuming will take more time for the darker and newer ones. Keep in mind, younger skin regenerates faster than older skin. I am 23 so the sales associate said I can expect faster results and suffice with the smaller size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like Nair. I cant put this on my face anymore because I think it smells so bad. Didn’t use it long enough to see results. Faded some dark spots on my leg though so I guess it works

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The dark spots on my face have significantly lightened since using this product. The smell is a little weird at first but you get used to it. I’d rather have a product that doesn’t smell the best that actually works than one that smells good but doesn’t do what it says. I was scared it would break me out but to my surprise it has actually helped with breakouts. I’ve tried to use it on my elbows and knees but I think because the skin there is a bit thicker it will take longer to work.

reviews.review_title: Smells decent, results not so much

But sadly, this product did not work for me. After 3 and 1/2 months I still have the same (if not more) acne scars and dark spots. I thought this would be my saving grace, but I think I’m well past being able to be helped by over the counter products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been struggling with hormonal acne and decided to give this a try. It works really well, calmed my acne down. It does have a strong smell almost like Nair products, but I don’t mind it at all if it can clear my skin. Highly recommend it to anyone with hormonal acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product has worked well for my old and new scars. You have to use this consistently in order to see results. Yes there is a smell, but what do you expect if a product doesn’t have any fragrance in it. overall great product I truly see results compared to any other part ive use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so so so so bad. The scent turns me off from wanting to use the product. I’ve been holding my breath and breathing through my nose when applying but the result is not worth it either. Ahhhhhh the smell!!! Please test it before purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has worked WONDERS for my skin. For starters, I would say that this works great on more fresh and newer hyperpigmentation. With any good and safe hyperpigmentation products, they’ll take up take 6 weeks or more to see results, and I’ve been using it consecutively for 7 months and boy I’ll tell ya. I use it alongside tretinoin which I’m sure helps. I honestly don’t care much for the smell, so I guess you could say I’ve got a tough nose. Overall great product that takes time to work. If your having issues, make sure you’re using an exfoliant on days off to help with the renewing of your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a little over two months and I’ve haven’t seen a change now I normally don’t have acne prone skin so it’s frustrating can anyone point me in the right direction

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well, doesn’t cause irritation for me. Unfortunately I won’t be repurchasing because of the smell. Maybe it’s because a lot of my hyperpigmentation is around my mouth/under my nose but I cannot stand to use this anymore, just due to the smell. It smells like nair mixed with human waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Photos below are a 3 week difference. I only used the product once a week for the first 2 weeks, and then used it two more times since. Will gradually go to using it every 2-3 days. Highly recommend it! It does have a rubber chicken like smell but the product is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a good product. I wish I can rate it as 0. It’s expensive and doesn’t work. I had tons of white heads post applying this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this as the ingredient list is amazing for hyperpigmentation. They threw the kitchen sink into the formula. I thought the other reviewers were exaggerating regarding the smell but I did a patch test and dear lord does that smell have staying power. For reference I use fragrance free products (which this is) so I'm used to formulas that smell not amazing- but this I could not handle. If they ever reformulate it to address this I would absolutely re-purchase and try it again since this combines so many great ingredients and is well priced. On the plus side, the patch test I did didn't irritate my sensitive skin so if you can handle the scent I say try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this. My skin care has more AHA, BHA, PHA to it but this works fine with it. I honestly love this product. I tried the mini and it really reduced some bad acne from the masks. I fought a long time with mask acne and this has truly helped a lot with the discoloration. I don't mind the smell but I recommend trying the small tube if you are unsure. Personally I really love this so I'm going to get the bigger tube. I use this at night to help the healing process.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gave me the worst cystic acne! I don’t mind the bad smell, but definitely made my skin worse. I do not understand the hype…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This saved my skin. Cleared my dark spot, old acne marks and a curling iron burn. Amazing, I will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff literally works, I was hesitant because nothing has worked at fading my acne scars and blemishes over my body (I have really sensitive skin) and I put this cream on overnight, woke up the next morning and a few old scars on my face were practically gone! Buy this! Just be cautious, there is a strong sulfur smell but it honestly doesn’t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the horrible habit of picking at acne. I have gotten better, but I still do it. This was something I saw recommended online, so, I figured I’d give it a try. It works! it’s going to take a little time, maybe 3-4 weeks is when you start to really notice a difference. But it works! I just got my second tube…. Bad habits are hard to break

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell. It smells like it’s accomplishing something medicinal. Like it’s working!  I think it does work eventually.  Hyperpigmentation is harder to fade than it is to prevent. Also, I contacted the people at Topicals and they said NOT to use this product in combination with a retinol (maybe alternate days), and to ALWAYS use sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t work. Maybe it’s just me but I used it for 2 months and nothing has changed. I personally recommend the ordinary’s serum, its cheaper and I applied it for a week and it actually made my Acnes and black heads much better. Or maybe it’s because I stopped wearing mask a couple weeks ago because school is over. However it’s just my experience and opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. I waited for it to be back in stock to purchase but I think I had a bad reaction and my face broke out crazy! I used it 1x a week the first week as per the instructions but the following week I used it 2x. Idk if that caused the reaction or maybe because I used Paula’s choice salicylic on the days between using topicals but my face broke out so now I’m returning it to be safe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just wow! I swear I have never been so thankful for a skincare product. This cleared up my acne and completely changed my skin from super oily to almost normal again! Life changing if you have acne!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this to help with discoloration with my armpits and although I haven’t seen a drastic change but I do see improvements and the texture of my skin has improved. I will say it has a weird smell (like nair) but I don’t mind..as long as I see it works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but I really wanted to after I’ve seen a lot of people complaining about the smell. After reading all those reviews, I was expecting A LOT worse, the smells not even that bad, and it doesn’t even linger. I’ve used it once so I can’t say if it works or not, but if you’re not willing to try it because of the smell, it’s really not that bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would purchase again. It does what it says! Love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As Johnny Beavo would say, “Whoa Mama!” I started using this twice a day, everyday from the first day I got it. Yes, I use sunscreen and my skin is able to handle a lot. It has been 21 days and my skin has gotten so much better. I had two patches of texture that WOULD NOT go away on my cheeks and today I can say its 80% gone. The smell is not as bad as some say it is. The results from this outweigh the smell. It doesn’t even last that long. A minute, maybe. Smells like nair. But wow. I am so happy with my skin and that hasn’t been said in over 2 years since I stopped BC. Also bought like butter and I love that too but Faded needed a review. If you are on the fence, get the smaller tube. That’s what I did and I still have a decent amount left after using it twice a day. But get a tube key.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had an upper lip melasma for two years. I wanted to give it a try, since dermatologist on youtube have recommended this cream as a great over the counter product. I bought the small tube   just in case it was not effective or irritating.  It's been a month and I've seen a huge difference from day one. It adapts so well with my DAY/NIGHT routine. I don't perceive the smell that everyone complains tho, I don't think it is to bad. I love that it is a POC brand and they donate to mental health organizations. I suffer with psoriasis so it makes me happy that there are people out there that wants to do good with their brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is AMAZING. I can literally see the difference in brightening and faded dark spots every time I use it. Will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very helpful if you struggles with acne scars. It has helped brighten my scars by a a lot. The only down side is the smell of this, it smells very strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the smell is bad… like BAD. like cigarette smoke and feet. i’m not too sensitive on smell but it was bad. i wanted to like it, i really did, but i used it twice and just couldn’t. the ingredients are incredible so smell it and see how you like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell isn’t as bad as people say it is. Unless you are extremely sensitive to smells I suppose.  The tube is cute, but you do have to be careful with it or to much will come out. To me that’s not a big deal though, as long you aren’t rough with it, it won’t leak in my experience.  As for the results, I’ve always had acne. At 29 I still had hormonal acne. I now only wash my face, use this product then use lotion before bed. This got rid of my acne, except for those random period pimples now. And my scars started to fade within two weeks. My light “new” scars started to fade immediately and I was extremely impressed. My skin texture also just looks healthier after using this on a semi regular basis. Now I’m working on those pesky old scars from when I was a teenager and threw 3 pregnancies when I had severe acne. I’m going onto my second tube and hoping it keeps working, slowly but surely the deep dark scars are fading!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not know how to fit this serum into my routine - wasn’t sure how it would mix with my other products. I have added this thicker serum with a sulfur (strong at first, doesn’t linger) scent to my nighttime routine every few nights and only layer a moisturizer on top. Immediately my skin looked brighter and still does as I continue to use the serum. I will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using on my dark underarms consistently for a month now and I have noticed a little difference…by the 2nd tube I think I would def be able to tell

reviews.review_title: Okay this actually stinks... but it works!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this smells actually horrible. I usually never care about the smell of skincare and I'm not particularly sensitive to smells but I actually have to make a point to hold my breath while applying this and my partner hates it because I come to bed all stinky. However, despite the smell this actually works and busts out hyperpigmentation over time. I have really bad dark red/ purple spots deep in my skin so nothing works overnight on me but overtime this has seriously lightened some of my darkest spots. This does nothing for active acne or pimples but is great if hyperpigmentation is the problem

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: HAVENT seen a difference. One it stinks and two it breaks me out with whiteheads. There are cheaper better options.

reviews.review_title: Can’t get over the bad smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would not repurchase this product even if it worked, the smell is that bad. As mentioned, it’s like Nair cream as far as scent. Not what I expected with such great packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This actually does lighten dark spots. I finally noticed a difference on my second tube. So, it does take time, but it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for around a week and I already see a difference in multiple areas where I have serious hyperpigmentation. I was hesitant at first because I have super sensitive skin and I am very susceptible to acne/breakouts but I have had zero problems. Also, you get over the smell and it is easy to cover! Going to purchase the big size next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: such a great product, really helps minimize dark colours, the smell isn't so bad and you get used to it. ultimately really enjoy using this at night to aid hyperpigmentation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum works wonders! I've seen a huge difference in my discoloration and uneven skin tone, as well as improved texture. The only downside, as everyone is saying, is it really does smell like burnt sulfur. However, it's not overpowering and it fades as soon as I apply the next step in my routine. I use this every morning between my Timeless vitamin C serum and PTR moisturizer steps, allowing 5 minutes between each step for adequate absorption. I've recommended this to my friends and they are in love as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff really does truly work; I will always repurchase. But it smells so bad. To me it smells like nair/veet. It’s worth it, but hopefully they will tweak the scent in the future

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really good and it’s helping my skin tone but the one thing I have a problem with is the smell of the serum. Other than that the product is still great and I recommend, just be prepared for the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I want to give this serum a fair shot and this review might be pre mature because I’ve been using this for a bout a month in rotation with my retinol serum. What I can’t stand about this product is the smell…. I dread opening the tube because it always spills out so much right away. The smell on my face is so pungent and unpleasant. I’m trying to power through the awful scent and hoping for some miracle results. So far I can see a slow improvement. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this. If you can get past the smell and stop thinking it’s raw chicken, you’ll be golden. The ingredients list for this product is incredible. It has all the hyperpigmentation-fighting superstars. I’ve now used this for 6 months and have noticed a solid gradual improvement in my acanthosis nigricans under my arms. My under arm skin is thick and the darkness is BAD. Now for any of you struggling with the same, I want to disclaim that though this helped a bit, it didn’t work miracles. After 3 months of consistent use, I decided to see my derm and got started on hydroquinone (which I’d recommend over this, but if you can’t get a prescription for that, this is a great alternative). I’ve loved using this during the periods where I take a break from hydroquinone. It does a great job and never causes a bit of irritation. If you combine this with Adapalene, you’ll get even better results. If you struggle with something like acanthosis, see a dermatologist. If you can’t get into seeing one, this will give you results, but it doesn’t work miracles overnight if that’s what you are expecting. Be consistent and patient. It works great on post inflammatory hyperpigmentation from acne spots on the face too!

I use it twice per day, in the AM, after my vitamin C serum and before sunscreen, and in the PM, after retin A and before my moisturizer. In less than two weeks, I've already seen great results. For best results, you MUST use an SPF every day, or the dark spots will return. I would have given it four stars but as other reviewers have mentioned, it stinks. The closest comparison I can think of is the old-fashioned perm solution, it has that kind of smell. It dissipates after a few minutes, but it's pretty stinky.

reviews.review_title: Works REALLY WELL for New Dark Spots
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall Experience: I recently had a big cyst on my chin that left a dark red/purple dime-sized spot. I scar super easily and I'm prone to keloids. I bought this to try out and it is absolutely working. After three weeks, it's about half the size it used to be and it's continuing to fade! I truly think it's going to go away completely. I'm applying it on old acne scars and even a burn scar but I'm not sure if it's working yet.  Smell: It smells horrible. It's the worst smelling skin care product I've ever bought. I make sure to wash my hands after using it. The smell does fade after awhile. I definitely wait a few hours before getting in bed since I don't want it on my sheets. Dealing with the smell is worth it though.  How I'm Using It: I use it at night after washing my face with YTP Superfood Cleanser. I use Thayer's Witch Hazel toner. (Before you discredit me for my toner choice, I know about the phenoxyethanol. I tried a bunch of other toners after they added it. My skin hated everything else and when I switched back my skin was happy again. I don't know. I'm okay with it.) I rub it in and wait until it dries. I moisturize with YTP Superfood Air-Whip Cream then follow up with their Dream Oil once in awhile. I've never experienced any pilling. The instructions say to use it once a week and work up to daily. I'm no beginner to retinol, AHAs, BHAs, etc., so I just jumped right to using it every day and I was fine. No peeling, burning, or redness. Make sure to wear sunscreen every day.  We all know that products like this are hit or miss. Everyone's results are different. I think this is worth spending the $18 on the mini to try out because if you're someone it works for, it really does help. If this doesn't end up working for you, at least you tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually write reviews but I am so happy with the results of this product in such short time of me using it. I recently gave myself a chemical burn using tea tree oil and of course it left a scar/ discoloration. I struggled with acne my teen years and finally as an adult was able to clear up my skin so to me this bothered me so much after struggling for years to be happy with my skin. I tried several different products to get rid of it but didn’t seem to work. But after being recommended this product only after one use i could already see the difference. The smell isn’t nice but it’s not unbearable, I also want to add that my skin is extremely sensitive and this product did a good job not irritating/ breaking out my skin.

The original smell was similar to sulphuric acid (but not terrible) and it was something I got used to. It never made me feel sick like the other reviews. With the new and updated formulation, it smells like they've added perfume but there's no fragrance listed in the ingredients on my package. I preferred the older formulation over the new one, because when I wash my face I can still smell it!! The scent is like cheap-classic grandma perfume masking the original formulation, and it's headache inducing!! As far as the efficacy of the product 4.5/5 stars. Helps heal hyper-pigmentation from new acne spots and calms down my skin. I don't know if I can keep using this product now unfortunately. The smell is unbearable.

reviews.review_text: I have only been using this product for a few days so I can’t speak about the efficacy of it doing anything for my skin yet, but I couldn’t not write a review about the smell of this product. I used to work in skincare for years and have no aversion to bad smelling products, but this product is putrid beyond anything I’ve ever smelled or used before. The reviews on here aren’t lying about how bad it smells. I put it on, forgot I did a few hours later, and walked around my house thinking that my dog had pooped in the floor somewhere. But it was only just this product sitting on my face. I can’t believe they couldn’t put some sort of fragrance or ingredient to block the smell because this is like smelling a trash can full of old chicken rotting in the hot summer sun. I’m going to give it a full two weeks to see if the smell is something I can get over if this product does actually work, but man Topicals really needs to work on the stench of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

At first it smells a bit like nair hair removal cream and then a bit like chicken afterwards but once it is on your face you cannot smell a thing and I feel like all of these reviews about the smell have you heating up for the worst but it is really not that strong. At first when I opened the tube I couldn’t even smell anything, it has a SLIGHT smell to it so if you are very sensitive to smells you may not like it but I think all the reviews are very misleading about the degree of smell it has.  Overall this product is awesome, not irritating, feels great on the skin, and minimized the look of my pores after one day of using it. I love it and highly recommend! Don’t let the negative “smells terrible” comments hold you back!

reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this product for fading scars and smoothing texture. Initially, I was using it all over the face (I felt like my whole face was a problem area) but I found it most effective to use as a spot treatment for targeted care.

reviews.review_text: FADED revolutionized my skin! When I started using it, I had a lot of acne scarring and hyperpigmentation. As a woman of color, I found that a lot of products targeted to fading weren't necessarily built with my skin type in mind. Within weeks of using Faded, my spots faded and my textural irregularities were a million times smoother. I gained so much confidence to go out without makeup and embrace my skin's natural texture. I use it every morning under my moisturizer and I will truly never stop using it. #1 holy grail product. See my before & after pics... the proof is in the pudding!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A true must have… if you want spot gone this is the answer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Still early in my experimentation with this product but I definitely see a glow on mornings after I applying Faded the night before! So far, a fairly neutral review but I have high hopes because of the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. If you break out, this will be helpful with the hyperpigmentation after the break out. I struggle with breakouts on my skin due to the mask. Not a big fan a mask. Though once my skin breaks out, this serum is helpful. With the breakouts leaving its hyperpigmentation this helps fade the hyperpigmentation. But I ain’t a big fan of the scent. Which if you don’t mind a scent to it, then this is perfect for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although the smell is pretty strong this product IS AMAZING!! All of the topical products are 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum WORKS! I’ve tried a lot of products to get rid of hyperpigmentation, but this Faded serum gets the job done! Although it has a very strong smell, it works. I apply the serum in both the morning and night. I highly recommend to anyone looking to get rid of stubborn dark marks and scars.

reviews.review_title: New formula has nasty masking fragrance, inferior
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pls note, this one star review is for the new formula.  I LOVED the old formula, honestly, it was the only thing I've used on my skin that I actually made a noticeable difference.  Yes, the smell was a bit sulfuric and medicinal, but that faded shortly after application.  The new formula is now fragranced and is awful.  If you have fragrance sensitivities, heads up.  I wish they would offer the old fragrance free one as an alternative.  Bring the old formula back please!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gets rid of my PIH so quickly! I love it. I don’t mind the smell. Packaging could be better, though, I hate the leaking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this product a few days ago so i'm still testing it out but I can say that the packaging is horrible. Every time I open this product so much cream just leaks out wasting tons of product. but i'm hoping it works and even though it has a bit of a smell i'm going to be consistent with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like I’m rubbing Nair on my face; but it works well! I use at night on non-retinol evenings and my skin appears so clear and glowy in the morning.

reviews.review_title: It does work - give it a few months.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about three months, and I do notice some of my scars seem lighter (especially one that I get from the nosepad on my glasses). I don't know if it'll completely lighten them, but it's rare to find a product like this where I can actually see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using this product for a week, I already noticed that my skin is much brighter and my acne scar is a little bit lighter. I don't like the smell of this cream tho, it's bearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is actually a miracle. Helped heal the redness and scaring from hormonal acne flare ups like crazy! The smell is definitely gross at first but it’s so worth it when you see results literally overnight!! Note: I have super fair, sensitive skin and this did wonders whereas oils always make me breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for treating dark spots & discoloration! Only knocking one star bc of the smell! If I use a light enough amount I can tolerate it for day wear, but I definitely prefer to use it more at night as it soaks into my skin better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to first state that this product is WORTH EVERY PENNY!! A lot of the reviews say how the serum stinks. Yes it does. It smells weird but trust me, GET PAST IT because this product will change your skin!!! I’ve had people tell me how I’m glowing ever since I started using it. I just repurchased my second tube because I notice a huge difference in the clarity of my skin. If you have dark circles from acne, dry skin, or going through the purging process, this serum will CHANGE YOUR LIFE!! Cannot recommend enough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this serum. I haven’t even gone through one whole tube and j can safely say i’ve seen such amazing results. My hyperpigmentation has faded overtime. I use this everyday with no irritation at all and it helps keep my skin, bright, hyperpigmentation free, and RADIANT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure how I feel about this so far. I’m not sure if I can get past the smell. It seriously smells like cat pee! That aside it has not broken me out or dried me out so that’s cool. Haven’t noticed a difference in my acne scars yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging on this is some of the worst I’ve ever come across. It wastes so much product every time and it makes me feel bad using it as it was so expensive. The smell is awful too but I can get past that, since I always prefer fragrance free skincare products. I think it’s too early to really tell how effective the actual formula is but I will say that the morning after using this I woke up with clear glassy skin! However if you’re on a budget, I strongly suspect that the inkey list’s tranexemic acid is a dupe for this. They have a very similar ingredient list and I’ve been using that for months and have noticed a huge improvement on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t always have break-outs, and this is not my day-to-day serum.  However, after I had a nasty break-out and a week of using this serum, the results were amazing.  I used it for three weeks after a break-out and it truly works.  Yeah, it smells bad but it’s a serum, so after you move on to moisturizer and sunscreen it goes away.  I will definitely keep some of this on hand for the next break-out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know how to feel about this product. Saw great reviews so decided to give it a shot. I noticed that I was getting little tiny bumps on my forehead and I wasn’t sure why until I realized it was this product. I decided to use it on my cheeks/chin only instead. Would still get closed comedones here and there. Besides that I didn’t really see a difference in my hyperpigmentation/blemishes and I was using this product almost every  night. Sadly not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. I had my doubts, but quickly saw results. My problem was a lot of hyperpigmentation  due to too much sun in my glory days. It smoothed out my skin and faded my dark spots. I will be a forever customer!

reviews.review_title: DOES THE JOB SMELLS LIKE BURNT RUBBER
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like burnt rubber but works super well. If you can get over the smell it’s not too bad. I found once I put moisturizer on the smell isn’t so bad. Does fade my acne scars but you can only use it a few times a week. Large amount of product for the price though considering you use so little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went through my tube so fast! Love this serum. It helped fade my dark spots and acne scars without making me breakout or feel too oily/sticky. Will be purchasing another tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just started using this for my acne scarring and discoloration as well as a mole on my face that’s always bothered me and I have already seen a difference! My skin is brighter and softer after using it. Only down side is the scent! It’s totally worth it though from what I have seen in such little time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a while to figure how how to use this product so i could see results. But it really works. I apply it all over my cheek area where i have the most hyperpigmentation and I have seen results! Using it as a spot treatment didn’t work for me so I use it consistently everyday on the entire area. It will take time to see results, so I would say be consistent and patient! But overall such a good product, i really saw it working after a few weeks! It clears my skin so nicely!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells identical to nair hair removal. I can’t get passed the smell. I also haven’t noticed any difference in my dark spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I went to open it and the product just shot out everywhere. And the first thing I noticed was the smell. I couldn’t even put this on my face because it was sooo bad! I can’t even put it on my face because it smells so bad. I really wanted to use this too because the brand was so kind and gifted me this product but I definitely prefer the yellow one!.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Look, I pick at my skin. Its my biggest flaw. Whenever I do facial extractions I’m always left with so much redness, some marks from shqueezin’ -you know the drill. Its disgusting, I know, and I have nobody to blame but myself.  But let me tell you- this stuff? heaven sent.  Redness and marks GONE OVERNIGHT. Not only that- it brightens. I put this on my hoohah too because I have slightly darker pigmentation down there and my god -that’s working too. Slowly down there for some reason, but I am seeing results. I’m currently doing laser hair removal down there and before I started using this cream the laser machine light didn’t reach all the way in certain areas that were darker. But after sticking with this stuff every night, the machine go ahead light has been going up a few notches.  So - dark underarms or other areas of the face or body that are hyper-pigmented, try this but remember a little goes a long way!!  TIP : I would HIGHLY recommend to use something fragrant over this because the smell is so unappealing. Glo Recipe watermelon or neutrogena hydroboost gel worked to mask the smell for me. But, if you don’t want to spend a fortune on fragranced moisturizer try Aveeno stress relief lotion on top of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everything that this product claims it delivers. A new staple in my skincare regimen.

reviews.review_title: Staple in my Skin Care Routine! Stick with it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Staple in my skin care routine! Yes it does have a metal like smell but it goes away quickly. Don't get discouraged if you use it and break out a little. It's normal for your skin to purge when trying new products. Especially ones with strong ingredients like Tranexamic Acid. I have been using it now for a little over a month and have seen drastic results. My skin is much smoother, brighter and almost 70% of my scars have faded. I'm surprised at how well it works. My advice, stick with it. No product transforms your skin overnight. Consistency is key. (PS: I have blemish prone sensitive skin)

reviews.review_title: If you have acne-prone skin, stay away!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, I saw this product on TikTok. I have sensitive, oily, and acne-prone skin. I thought since this is clean at Sephora I would not have an issue. The smell was horrid. I would imagine it to be the smell of burnt something. Lastly, it triggered so many abnormal breakouts that it did not seem worth it to continue the use in order to see results on my hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Worked SO well. Will forever repurchase and one bottle lasts forever. Worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks amazing! I have hormonal acne and this has helped so much! It definitely takes a while to see results and you have to use it consistently but 100% worth it. The only downside is that the smell is awful but after a week I didn’t really notice it anymore. Overall will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best! Only been using for a month but has already help fade my acne scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing ! I see a lot of people complaining about the smell it’s not strong at all and  due to the ingredients it would make sense why there is a scent . Saw result With in a month BEST ON TGE MARKET !

You can’t use this with AHAs or BHAs which I like and since I’m not seeing results with this it pains me not to be able to use other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I used it once a day at night before bedtime for over two months and dramatically saw a change in my dark spots. Definitely helped with my sun spots from tanning so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. After having perfect skin in my teenage years, I started breaking out heavily on my forehead recently. I’m a skin picker, so I can’t help but pick at my acne which results in aggressive scarring and a lot of redness. I gave this product a fair chance and used it for over a month. Yes, the product does help with hyperpigmentation and brightens the skin… HOWEVER… I started getting a million little white heads and bumps on my face :( As a result and for the price, this product is not worth it for me. If you have sensitive skin this product might not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, I used it once a day at night before bedtime for over two months and dramatically saw a change in my dark spots. Definitely helped with my hyperpigmentation as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second Faded and it won’t be my last. It brightens my hyperpigmentation and is the perfect addition to my night time routine. I love how it applies so smooth and leaves a glow.

reviews.review_title: Be patient, stay consistent& hold your nose!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I was kind of skeptical about this one. I also wanted to wait at least a month or so before I wrote a review. I’ve picked a designated area to apply this everyday  (for the past three to four weeks) and at first I didn’t notice anything. But recently I’ve noticed the spots in that area are definitely getting lighter and the texture of my skin in this particular area is smoother. Now, the smell! Omg it is pretty bad; smells like rotten eggs. However, I really don’t care about a smell if the product works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So imma start with this I never leave a review but I have to say this cream must have the tears of baby Jesus in it. I never used something with such quick and outstanding results, I already know this is one skin care gem that I’ll have forever. For everyone wanting to know yes it stinks but after the first use, you get used to the smell. So just buy it, my acne clear up and darks spot are gone. This cream is also good for if you’re breaking out suddenly, just dab some on your face at night the next morning clear skin or the bumps go down significantly. Thank you to the person who made this you put your whole foot in this miracle serum!  I wish took something before and after pictures I didn’t think it would work so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Came up on tiktok and decided to bite as it seems like my scars take forever to fade. I’ve only been using for about two weeks and can already see a noticeable difference! You don’t need to use much when applying so I can justify the price easily. HOWEVER - This smells weird!! It’s very strong at first but the results so far are worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for 2 months and it’s literally changed my skin game! It started off slow and I did have a small breakout at the beginning. My acne scars have decreased substantially and I have hyper pigmentation so anytime I have a breakout, it turns into a scar. I cannot recommend this product enough but you do need to be patient. For the price, this is worth it and there is a smell but the results outweighs the smell for me. BUY IT NOW.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so awful I can’t keep using it. If it produced results the smell might be with it, but it hasn’t made a bit of difference on my dark spots. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In general my skin doesn’t keep discoloration from breakouts or scar for long but this product definitely speeds up the healing process & helps them fade in a couple days instead of a week or 2. Love this product & love this brand! It’s amazing.  If you use on entire face, instead of as a spot treatment it definitely brightens and evens out skin tone after all.  One of the few products that delivers what it promises in such a short time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using this for a little over a month now and i’ve seen a HUGE improvement in stubborn acne scars. i really don’t think the smell is that bad, definitely a little odd but it really doesn’t bother me that much. i will note i went on vacation for a few days and forgot it at home and i saw the scars coming back so you have to be VERY consistent with it.

reviews.review_title: I’ll Give it More Time to Work!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will start off by saying that I think it’s too soon to leave a review, but I would otherwise forget to do so, so based on how long I’ve had this I will give it 3-stars: it’s solid. What I like: it does not irritate my skin & has a nice, smooth texture. What I don’t like: the SMELL! Reminds me of hydroquinone products. It does not fade on me, so I’ll usually pair it with moisturizers that have a slight fragrance to them. What I don’t know: whether it’s truly effective at fading hyperpigmentation. Scars fade naturally on their own, so i can’t say for sure whether the scars I’ve had faded because of this product, or because of the timing, or because of other products I use when I’m not using this (e.g. retinol or vitamin c). I like the ingredients in this product, so I’m going to continue using it until I feel it’s run its course. I use this on my body as well as my face. I’ve only been using this sparingly for about a month; we’ll see! I can’t yet recommend it because of this, especially since the smell might be  bit off-putting for some; however, it doesn’t hurt to try, especially to support a black-owned brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yeah, it smells bad but when you have difficult skin, you don't really care what the product smells like as long as it works. This tube costs less than professional facials and has been incredibly helpful. Scars that have been on my face for YEARS have disappeared within a month. I'm almost done with my first tube and I plan on getting another. I don't really care if it smells like rotten eggs as long as it's getting the job done and it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing product with a powerful ingredients list. i saw results in a few weeks and did not purge ! truly is amazing. but it  REEKS and it smells like pee. or a rotten vegetable. idk if i received a bad one or the old smellier formulation but wow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this 2 weeks ago. My skin had a bad breakout session after I took some medications which left lots of discolouration and hyperpigmentations. I definitely see a dramatic difference with my skin tone and the texture.   But ladies know that this product will help maintain your skin concerns not necessarily fix. I professional done dermaplanning and a chemical peel 2 days prior to start using FADED. Obviously it’s a combination of all those treatments which helped me achieve the best result from this Topicals serum! Overall I see a visible improvement with my skin and really happy to keep using FADED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell. I can’t get over it. So if you are considering this product be warned it really does smell awful. It smells like mechanical lubricant or something. I was not expecting it and it unfortunately ruined the whole vibe of my skin care routine. Will not be using again for that reason. :( wanted to like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: broke me out. But I did see a change on old acne pigmentation though so it may work for you. my skin may just not like an ingredient. The smell is disgusting, smells of sulfur and will stain your pillow sheets with it (the smell, no colour). don’t nap!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really surprised to find how well this actually works. This is not a bleaching cream or miracle product that’s going to even you out overnight, also it has a scent that I believe comes from the active ingredients; kinda reminds me of Nair. Needless to say, this serum does a good job of easing my skin into being even and it always leaves me looking radiant. I enjoy layering it with heavier creams and oils but I recommend following the instructions exactly as they’re given for the best results.

reviews.review_title: Great! don’t let the bad reviews turn you away
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw a few bad reviews and I was a little nervous but within one week using as directed I saw major improvement. The product can be strong especially if you have sensitive skin or have not used vitamin c before so I would keep that in mind. I am very happy with my results. I am brown to dark brown with combination skin. I recommend using at night but if you do use it in the morning use a high spf like 100

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It practically did nothing to my skin I use it every morning and it has done nothing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so bad. it broke me out like crazy, don’t waste ur money just go with the hero cosmetic lightening wand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: really wanted to like this because all of the great reviews i read but i have been using this 2-3 times a week as suggested, and i have noticed no difference after months of using. i personally HATE the smell but at least it doesn’t linger at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using this product on and off (about 2 weeks on, 1 week off) because i notice that while it does help with fading acne scars, using the product (for me personally) more than about 2 weeks irritates my skin and can lead to more break outs. my suggestion is to use this every other night as to not damage the skin. i have acne prone sensitive and dry skin, so i think my advice would be best suited for people with similar skin type as me. i don’t regret buying this product but i feel that there may be other products that dont irritate and smell the way this one does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly had high hopes for this cream and I’m not usually acne prone but after two uses I noticed more breakouts than normal and the smell really got to me, won’t be purchasing again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was soooo excited to try this product after a BAD breakout last year (still have many PIEs). I have noticed that it improved my PIE. I do have to stop sometimes when my skin gets irritated. The experience isn't great though.... The smell really isn't that bad... people are exaggerating... but it leaks a lot which is frustrating because you end up waisting some of the product and I always have a crust of dried product... The product is good, the packaging not so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason why I am giving a start is because it doesn’t let me give none at all. I purchased this product a month ago because of some positive reviews posted here. Used the cream for 4 and didn’t saw any results the cream didn’t work at all. Please do not buy this cream is not worthy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! This is my holy grail dark spot treatment. It does smell (personally to me it smells like OG nair) But the smell does not linger and I don’t smell it on my face once rubbed in. The effectiveness of the product deffs outweighs the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly obsessed with this product. Had my doubts because I know products like this either tend to take a lot of time to work, or don't work at all. I was prepared for my skin to purge (and it definitely did, for maybe 3 weeks or so) but now I can use it every day on my hyperpigmentation with no break outs. I have struggling badly with hyperpigmentation for at least a year due to hormonal acne and I swear I can notice a difference after each use even. Also, the smell is nowhere near as people make it out to be (I think they fixed this actually).
This used to be my holy grail but they changed the formulation and it doesn’t work as well and the scent is unbearable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is phenomenal. I’ve been using for two weeks and have noticed crazy results. I started using it every night instead of the once a week because my skin was handling it well. I’ve tried a lot of creams and serums and this one is by far the best. Same results as when I used to get chemical peels!  BUY IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had doubts but only because i didnt think it worked. Luckily i kept track if my progress and it definitely did help .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. First of all, the smell is NOT that bad - it smells like sulfur and goes away so quickly do not let that deter you from trying this. I use this on my face, chest, & shoulders for breakouts and scarring and my skin has NEVER been smoother & brighter. It also lasts a long time so you don’t need to repurchase constantly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works much faster than a few fade creams I’ve tried. Depending on The severity of your symptoms, however it will take time! This is Not an over night fix, my dark spots from acne lightened within two months! I use it twice a day consistently and I’m purchasing my second tube!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only product that has made a difference on my skin. Surprisingly I don’t get break outs as much anymore or at all. My acne goes away super fast like in 3 days vs before where it would take 2 weeks for a pimple to finally go down. My hyperpigmentation is finally starting to fade, and my skin feels so smooth in the morning. All I do is wash my face, put this on, and a moisturizer and my skin doesn’t get irritated by it. It does smell but that goes away after you rub it in, nothing unbearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells horrific!! I would always see great reviews about this product but the smell is almost unbearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works for hyperpigmentation BUT as the other reviews mentioned it can also cause acne (maybe from the shea butter?)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product’s effectiveness! ABSOLUTELY HATE THE PACKAGING!! This needs to be in some sort of pump because this packaging leaks all the time. There is no way to close it where nothing leaks out! If anyone knows a way please respond!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m sure this would be effective due to the cocktail of ingredients, but not sure why they would add pore clogging ingredients in something targeted towards post-acne marks. I made the mistake of knowing that and still wanting to try it bc of the hype/other ingredients and it broke me out BAD. If you’re acne-prone I wouldn’t risk it. There are other alternatives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing great reviews, I was so excited to try this product! However, WHY IS NO ONE TALKING ABOUT THE SMELL?? I’ve only used it a few times and have gagged every time.. it smells like burnt hair mixed with some weird cheese! I’m going to try to continue using it but just beware if you’re sensitive to smell, like me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so when I got this long way back, I loved it ! used it every day and saw my hyperpigmenation reduced. I ended up moving to BC and used it there and broke out from it after each use. it was like tiny white lil pimples. I had to discontinue use. I moved back to my current city so I might try it again. But ladies, I found two good alternatives I've been using if this doesn't work. 1. alpha arbutin +HA. Let me tell you this works soo good ! Also, use the TXA from Inky list which also helped reduce dark spots!

reviews.review_title: The Holy Grail treatment for Hyperpigmentation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the holy grail for treating hyperpigmentation! I have tried so many other products for my dark spots but none have worked as well as this, it’s been a month now and I see a major difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out like crazy. Be very careful if you have acne prone skin which I’m assuming you do if you’re using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can not say enough good things about this item! If you’re going to buy ANYTHING this year get her ✨ it smooths your face overnight. Feels moisturizing. Smells funky at first but it dies down quickly. You need it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the results! This stuff works like magic! The only thing is that I could not get past the smell. I can typically handle fragrance free skincare if it works but it felt like a chore to use it. It’s a great product but the experience was not great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Topicals recently reformulated this and removed the coconut oil and palm butter, so it’s now better for oily, acne-prone skin types. Don’t know why they added them in the first place since they’re known comedogenic ingredients, but better late than never.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dying! Was so excited to receive. Opened it up and whammy! It STINKS!  Hoping I can get past the smell to test the actual product…..3 stars bc of scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re sensitive to coconut oil please do not buy! It did lighten old hyperpigmentation but gave me the gift of new pimples! The smell is bad but it’s not as bad as people are making it out to be, it disappears pretty quickly. Looks like I’m in the minority because it seems to work well for most however, just beware.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m trying to like this product but everytime I use it I’m always welcomed with breakouts all over my face. I hate that so much cause my breakouts always end up leaving a dark spot which kind of defeats the purpose of the product. Like I’m literally going in circles….I just want my skin to be clear honestly:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to love this product but as soon as I broke the seal I gagged at the smell. It’ll be hard to get used to so I hope this actually helps with my dark spots.

reviews.review_title: There’s a smell yes but it’s not that bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product so far and my skin is clearing up but it’s too early to talk about that. I wanted to leave a review because I wanted to say that it doesn’t smell that bad. When I bought it I was mentally prepared for it to be the worst thing that I’ve ever smelled. All anyone ever talks about when referencing this product is how awful it smells. But truthfully, when I went to put it on my face for the first time it was a little anti-climactic. Meaning, I was prepared for something that smelled terrible and it just wasn’t that bad. And then when I used it for the second time I smelled it again because I thought “OK, maybe it was just at one time” but the second time it didn’t smell that bad either. Now, I’m not saying there isn’t a smell because there is but it’s just not as awful as everyone is making it out to be. And once you layer your other products on it you can’t even smell it. Don’t let the smell be the reason you don’t get this product. I really feel like people are making the smell out to be worse than it actually is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this serum for about a month and I am very impressed with the results. I do not normally get a lot of acne, but any pimple I get leaves a red mark for months. My skin is also pretty sensitive. I used Retin-A for anti-aging for 2 years but stopped 3 months ago because I think I did a number on my moisture barrier.   I started out using Faded every 2-3 days for the first 2 weeks. I had no irritation or breakouts. I now use it 5-6 days a week and my skin looks the best it has in awhile. My PIE has faded (not totally gone, but enough that I stopped wearing foundation and now just use a bit of concealer); my skin is glowing; and my forehead lines seem to have softened (but that could be due, in part, to the fact that my moisture barrier is no longer compromised).   I believe I have the reformulated version - it has a distinct smell - but it’s not bad at all. I’m really surprised at how effective Faded seems to be, while also being non-irritating. I’ve recently learned that my skin loves niacinamide - I use TO’s 10% serum in the morning and Faded at night. It’s been a great combo for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff. Dude. So first you should know that it smells awful. So so bad. The first few times I used this I gagged while putting it on my face. It was actually pretty funny haha. Now I'm somewhat used to the smell. BUT WOW! TALK ABOUT RESULTS! My skin went through a purging phase in the beginning as per usual when I add a new product into my skincare routine, but now my skin is so clear from acne and my hyperpigmentation is fading so nicely! This is the first product I've found that has actually had any effect on my stubborn scars. I am very impressed. Just buy it already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I read the reviews before buying it ! It smells awful, real awful fragrance - can’t sleep with this product on. Sticky after application. I applied and had to rinse it in 20 mins. Can’t take risk to break out coz of my bad choice of an overhyped product ( 2 stars coz I don’t know if it works - I will not use it beyond one use)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to this product but when I say the SMELL is awe is smelled like Nair. Im going to give it a 30 day test and see if I see a difference I will say use this at night only I can’t image going out smelling like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have it a 4 because of the smell other than that I’ve been using it for 2 weeks now and I already see a difference in my skin. I’ll keep using and give an update after a month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so I love that this product is black owned! But it does have fragrance and because we are trying to treat hyperpigmentation, fragrance can actually cause more hyperpigmentation and make it harder to treat. The active ingredient claims are not at the top of the ingredient list which causes me to feel iffy since coconut oil is farther up on the list than the actives

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pains me to write this because I really wanted to love this product and support black owned businesses. However, using this product has been counterproductive because it has actually caused acne! I had my acne under control with very few breakouts and purchased this product to attempt to remove PIH. This has caused my acne to flare up again and white heads. The texture of my skin is awful now. Please rethink this formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Full 5 stars only because this product does what it’s supposed to do!! Only been using for a week… A WEEEK! My skin had been breaking out due to me mistreating my skin and this CLEARED my acne along with lighten my acne scars! Might I say it is not completely gone acne nor hyperpigmentation/scarring. BUT i can tell soon it’ll be long gone with this product! My acne keeps fading and hyperpigmentation/scarring. The results are scary good! Yes it does smell but if you don’t get bother by smells easily I say try it asap. But I would say I’m sure the reason the product works is because of the smell itself…the ingredients are important. Love that I can use this everyday (use as spot treatment also if you don’t want it everywhere)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a black owned business but this products has caused my skin a lot of pimples. I wanted to try the product because I recently got rid of most of my bumps and wanted to get rid of dark marks and then this happened…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because wearing masks has caused me acne and i have pih on my cheeks. I have tried it a few times to see if my face is going to get used it to but no every time i put this on my face i end up getting more acne. I just waisted my money.

reviews.review_title: The best thing I've ever done for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does this smell great? No. Does it fade quickly? Yes. Is it worth is 10000% yes. I have been on accutane but had some texture and scarring leftover. I've been using retinols for years without much help. Let's be honest- I've used everything for years without much help. Every AHA/ BHA toner out there, those expensive individually packaged peel pads, dermaplaning, hydrofacials, LED masks, all the things. But this improved my skin so much in3 weeks multiple friends AND my dermatologist asked me what I did. I cannot recommend it enough. I've been using it 3x a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for some acne scars that I’ve had for a few months and just wanted the get rid of. I used it on them and on my cheeks because I also had some hyperpigmentation. The next few days a few whiteheads had formed where I had used the product. I think this is due to the coconut oil in the formula, which is known to cause pores. I thought since it was in a low amount it would be fine, but for my sensitive skin it was not. And not the mention the smell, which is rancid and smells like cat food. Do not buy if you have sensitive skin!! I wish this had worked because I paid $36 dollars for it, but it is the worst thing I have every used on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was really excited about this product but after almost a month of gradual to regular usage I can say it does not work for me, my skin actually is going through a flare up right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a game changer for my skin. I struggle with hyperpigmentation and I’ve seen great results since I’ve been using it. I’ve purchased 2 tubes so far!

reviews.review_title: BROKE ME OUT - DO NOT BUY
