reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is used to harsh products, also I have really clear skin. The only reason why I bought it was to get rid of my dark marks that I still have from getting acne in high school (6+ years ago). I tried it at night, the next morning I had little hives/ small bumps on my face which I NEVER GET. The most I get is maybe a tiny pimple when I’m on my period.   I do NOT recommend this product at all, especially if you already suffer from acne - it will make things worse for you.   Anyone suffering from dark marks, I recommend Ambi fade cream (I’ve used that in the past and it helped make my dark marks lighter) x

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really bad and didn’t see the improvement on my skin.

reviews.review_title: Stay Away And Safe Your Money!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be one of the best products on the market, this serum used to be everything that you wanted. My issue with this serum is that they changed the formula and before it used to come in a smaller package and now they have updated it to a much larger size and but with less quality. I bought two because I thought I was buying the previous version, I regret it with my heart. And yes it used have a weird smell but with great quality now you obtain a horrible quality and overpriced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Did not work, in fact made my dark spot darker!! I do not recommend this product at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try it but when I smelled it in the package it smelled like it was rotten. Can definitely find something that works as well and doesn't smell so bad!   0/10 do not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm usually not picky on smells but this one...I can't. I read through all the reviews about its bad smell, I thought I'd be ok with it. But I WAS WRONG. At this point, I don't care about the results. I just don't wanna open it ever again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I have been using it for a month now and it has lightened my stubborn acne scars!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Skincare always takes at least a month to work, but I swear that I saw a difference in one of my hyperpigmentation spots the first time I applied Faded.

reviews.review_title: Perhaps some people have a stronger sense of smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this product three months to work, using every other night, but didn't see noticeable results. I suffered through the smell, which was terrible for my sensitive nose, but found that if I put moisturizer on to then the smell went away pretty quickly (though not totally). I could only wear this at night because it pills underneath moisturizer and makeup, no matter how thinly I spread it on. I read that you should not use this with AHA, BHA or retinols, and I prefer the results from those products so Faded got tossed out. Glad that some people have great results, but this one was not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t work for me after a few weeks.  Smells so bad, I discontinued use after that. Had to replace my pillow.  Couldn’t stop smelling it even after washing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well for fading dark spots! I use it for old hyperpigmentation. When acne forms a whitehead, I slap a pimple patch on it (while using BPO or BHA) until the pus is no longer an issue. Then, I use faded on it during the healing process :) Makes for much less problems dealing with hyperpigmentation caused by acne. A little bit goes a long way as well, so you get good value for the price. People complain about the smell, and it is noticeable-- but I let it dry down and wash my hands before applying the rest of my products. I don't notice a lingering smell that way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it smells like sulfur. That's not the issue for me. It has fragrance (not listed here or the website, but on the box. Ethylene brassylate, look it up) AND the ingredients on the box are very different than the website and what's listed here on Sephora. On their site and here on Sephora, it lists coconut oil; nowhere to be found on the box though. Also on the box, some of the things that are supposed to be helpful - azelaic acid, kojic acid, alpha arbutin - are listed AFTER shea butter and jojoba oil...This whole thing leaves a bad taste in my mouth for $46. The two stars were for the potential.

reviews.review_title: Black women purchase this product ASAP!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: On Day 7 already seeing results! I'm afraid to say it because I don't want to jinx it but this is probably the best my skin has looked in such a short amount of time I am extremely happy with this product I'm about to buy my second to just to make sure I have it so that I don't run out. And trust me I know because I would use hydrocortisone for dark spots both 2% hydrocortisone and 4% hydrocortisone and this works better than both. My overall skin is extremely smooth which is blowing my mind. If you are a black woman with hyperpigmentation stubborn dark spots I would say 100% purchase this product ASAP! Oh and the smell is not bad at all I don't know if they maybe change the smell but it has no smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, I don’t care about the smell. I care about results. Yes, it doesn’t smell pleasant, but I wasn’t concerned about that if the product delivers. Unfortunately, if you’re using this product to reduce acne scarring, it probably means you’re acne-prone, and coconut oil is one of the WORST ingredients to put on your face if you’re prone to breakouts. Super pore clogging, I gave this product multiple chances and each time it took my skin a month to bounce back from the acne that appeared the day after I used it. Not a very thoughtful formulation for the product’s target group.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I don’t know why people complain about the smell, it’s not that bad but I love how people these days want products with no artificial fragrance and then complain about the natural smell, bottom line, people will always complain. Second, this product is AMAZING - I’ve tested it for about 3 weeks now (fist week only did it one night to see how my skin reacted, second week every other night and now every night). I’ve struggled with hyperpigmentation every time I get a pimple no matter what. It’s got a PERFECT combination of powerful ingredients that I’ve already tried in the past but I love how this product combined the best. Great job and this is now a staple in my every day skincare routine. Be consistent if you don’t see results right away, trust me :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great, if you have any kind of acne hyperpigmentation this stuff does a great job of getting rid of it, especially if it's brand new, it really speeds up healing time. As some have mentioned the smell is not great but having used other products for pigmentation, like the Differin Hydroquinoine gel, it seems to be a trend with this kind of product. It's not off-putting enough that it bothers me. Ultimately you're looking at a choice between a product that really works, or a slightly unpleasant smell. I'll take the product that works every time. Only complaint would be the packaging, it can be a bit wasteful as it sometimes dispenses too much which often happens with this type of metal tube packaging, something with a pump might be nice but isn't a dealbreaker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get this and try it out. The smell is unreal. Before I even applied it to my face I was overwhelmed by the smell. It will be going back.

reviews.review_title: Stinky and not compatible with other ingredients
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good! I’m still too new to using this product to comment on long term changes in skin but so far I like it. My one complaint would be it does stink but not enough to turn me off from using it. Really reminds me of products with sulphur. I have never used a product with azelaic acid before so maybe that is the smell? I’m not sure. Another thing to note is this product is meant to be used once a week and then worked up to every night and it cannot be combined with other acids or retinol from my understanding so if you have those products in your skincare routine that you already love there will be a confliction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought people were kidding when they said they could stand the smell. Ok it’s bad lol BUT it works. I will sleep with a stinky face to wake up with a baby face the next day forever! My scars are already fading after one week of use and my Skin is SO soft. I have a lot of acne scars fresh and old ones and texture and this works wonders on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is so horrible and the application is almost like watery. Do not recommend at all. It made me break out as well and i can’t stand the smell. This was definitely a mistake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The sulfur smell goes away within a minute or so of application so you’re missing out on a really good product if the smell is what’s holding you back. This is amazinggggg for discolouration from acne and I’ll definitely be buying again ! (FYI seems they’ve added a fragrance to cover up the smell)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product applies well. I rub it in after I use a hydrating toner. I used it three times so far and I haven’t had any negative reactions. I use it at night, once or twice a week. It does give my face a glow the next day. I also use Biossance’s Vitamin C serum (which is great BTW!), and also helped fade and brighten my overall complexion.   The smell is somewhat offensive but I can tolerate it. Surprisingly, I don’t notice it after a while. Remember to wash your hands after using it or you will smell it forever!!! I am hoping it will reduce my milia and the few stubborn acne scars I have from a breakout I had months ago.   My issue is with the packaging. The product keeps coming out even when I don’t put pressure on the tube and was holding it upright. I have to close the tube while little bit of the product is still coming out. Is it possible to have a different packaging? Does anyone have tips for handling the product?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No puedo todavía dar buenas calificaciones pero si he notado algunos cambios a penas llevo 15 dias usándolo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is not the greatest but I can get passed that because I AM OBSESSED. I can easily tell a difference in my skin and I have very bad acne scars ! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells terrible but works great. If you can get over the smell (rotten eggs/baby poop) then go for it. I find it more effective than the Sunday Riley UFO oil and it’s a fraction of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smell is one of the worst things I've ever smelt. It seriously smells like cat pee it's almost unbearable. I want to use it more but it's hard when I almost gag every time lol. Not sure how the results are yet, anyone else have this experience with the smell? God it's awful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the closest you’re going to get to a miracle when it comes to lightening dark marks and scars. Smells a bit like raw chicken, the newer tubes are less intense but still slightly there. Doesn’t bother me  with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for about 2 months now and it seems to be helping with fading my dark spots! The downside is the strong sulfur/ rotten eggs smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this product and have used it once so far. I agree with other reviews wherein the smell is terrible but Topicals (on their Instagram) had already stated that this product does have a smell so I expected it. It’s still a very horrid smell though. Luckily, it subsides after a few minutes. I did not break out whatsoever from this product. In my opinion, I don’t believe Sephora had put the adequate amount of information shoppers need to know before using this product. On Topicals Instagram, they stated that you should NOT be using this product in the same routine as your exfoliants (BHA, AHA, etc) and retinoids. I wouldn’t have known that have I not gone on their Instagram and checked their highlights in regards to this product. They also provide more information about the product on their own website. I do believe that if I did not follow their instructions, tips and tricks, I would’ve too broken out. Please go their Instagram and website to inform yourself before making a decision. I can’t wait to see what my skin looks like in a few months and will be doing an updated review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many things and I eventually just stopped but after seeing all these good reviews I really thought this would help. Sadly it did not. I only used it once and the next day I broke out crazy and it was gigantic pimples. It didn’t work for me but it might for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had acne for a few years, and I’m prone to picking it and causing some scaring. This product didn’t take long before I noticed some change in my acne scaring, but the smell… PUTRID. It was so bad I almost gagged the first time I got a whiff of it. But for the good results, it might be a small price to pay. If you can get past the gnarly fumes it’s definitely worth a try :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This caused my face to breakout from just one use. It’s the only “new” product I’ve introduced into my routine so I know it is the cause. I waited a week to try it again and I woke up with small breakouts all over my face. I’ll use this under my arms and my Brazilian area because it’s so expensive. If your skin is sensitive, do not buy this!! 0 stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i did not expect it to literally smell like raw eggs but thankfully i am not sensitive to smell. I did not see much of a difference in the beginning. As soon as I started using it every other day at night, there was a noticeable brightness/ glow on my face the next morning.   Therefore, definitely recommend it for hyperpigmenation if you are not sensitive to smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NASTY!   This product smells SO BAD, you have zero desire for regular use. Also left my skin rough and bumpy. But the smell is ungodly. Way overhyped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 1 star because it says what its going to do in terms of discolouration, however my redness will be gone but ill wake up to an enormous amount of whiteheads which leads to further redness. Kinda pointless if thats whats gonna keep happening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this serum!  Part of my regular routine and helps with fading dark spots.  You will need to give it time to see results but it does work! Recommend for anyone looking to target discolouration.  The only downside is that it sells out fast and restock can be slow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s been a month since I’ve started using Faded by Topicals and I have definitely noticed a difference in my skin. Initially, I used Faded once a week at night to assess my skin’s reaction, but I bumped up my usage to 3-4x weekly at night after seeing improvement within the first week. Not only have my acne scars started to fade, but my skin’s texture has improved dramatically. Now I will say, my acne scars have not faded completely, but with continued use and patience, I’m very sure my post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation will subside. This serum also cleared some pustules and whiteheads I was dealing with due to a chemical sunscreen I was using! I’m so happy I purchased and I will definitely check in next month when I see even more improvement. (P.S. Besides the use of mineral sunscreen and my cleanser that contains kojic and azaleic acid, Faded is the only other product I use for post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. It really is the main character!)
Not worth the money. I got way too much breakouts and its very oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It worked wonders on my skin.Don’t love the smell but the results are super worth it. Will definitely be re-purchasing this, a new staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Y’all, this DOES work. You just have to be consistent. I’ve had hyperpigmentation since 2018. I’ve been using this since the summer w/ sunscreen and it has worked. It isn’t overnight but keep at it. I’m almost done with my first tube and going to start by second soon. It doesn’t work overnight but it does work. I worked my way up to 3 nights a week and that’s all you need. Try it and keep at it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This helped speed up the process of fading my acne scars! I tend to get red acne scars around my check area (some that have taken ~2.5 years to completely fade). And I got some new acne scars recently and was bummed because I just cleared my skin. But this product has sped up the process so much! The scars are still there after ~2 months, but are sooo much lighter!! With consistent use this product can be a holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this topical. It took a long time for my skin to adjust to it and in the directions it says to use once a week to allow our skin get use to the product before using it more frequently. It leaves a healthy glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Helps with redness and makes your face glow. I put it on before bed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried many products and this one is by far the best for PIH caused by acne. Works best if you start using it early as the pimple is healing but it also faded some more established marks.  It does stink in the tube but once applied to my face I don’t notice it and neither does my husband.  It doesn’t work (in my experience) for established sun spots/freckles but generally OTC topicals don’t.  This product doesn’t break me out and I actually feel it helps with my acne. So overall extremely happy I found this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only hyperpigmentation product that has ever worked for me. I use it for PIH from pimples and scars on my arms from KP. Within the first week it was already starting to fade. I also don't notice a strong or bad odor from the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I could not get past the smell. Normally when I read that I skip right past the review, but honestly this smells like Nair. If you can stomach the smell of Nair, then go for it! But it was way too much for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a superb product. I've have dealt with acne scarring for years and this seems to be the most effective product that helps reduce stubborn spots on my face and assist with the texture on my skin. The results can be seen within one week of usage. Yes, it does have a perm like smell but I can tolerate it because it yields stellar results. I have been using this product for about a few months now and it's a staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: Don't even think, just add to cart
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Whoever is complaining about the smell, please stop. It is a very faint smell that goes away within seconds. This serum works really well for hyperpigmentation and acne scarring, especially for people of color, like me! I don't like products with single ingredients so I am a big fun of multiple ingredients in a single serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love. Use it every other night, always wear spf in the day and the new formula has a much gentler smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my overnight secret weapon for when I want my best skin the next day. I wake up to a more even, brighter complexion. I don't find it irritating nor does it break me out. The smell is heinous but I can look past that for these results. Also, the packaging makes it really tricky to not waste product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Had really high hopes that this would clear the post inflammatory hyperpigmentation on my face, and after using it religiously for a couple of months saw no changes at all. Waste of money IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To say the least it broke me out and it Smells horrendously awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is after 8 days of using it every night! Only difference is I use a BHA toner in the morning and my Cetaphil face wash every time and a rlly good moisturizer! Fits into my simple skincare routine and works wonders for dark spots. Can’t wait to see a difference after a month

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can withstand the odor but honestly this is a tricky product to fit into my routine. It’s very greasy and leaves me very very shiny. I also didn’t notice a difference on my hyperpigmentation unfortunately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t have melasma I just needed to fade a few acne scars I had on my face, nothing extreme and this did not work at all. I used the whole tube and it didn’t make any difference. Unfortunately, a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has been a godsend for my Post-Inflammatory Hyperpigmentation! I have always had hormonal acne and even after Accutane I still break out (not nearly as badly though). It’s so frustrating how a pimple can heal in a few days yet I’m left with a dark spot for so long afterwards. But this serum has made those marks go away MUCH faster!!! Disclaimer though, I diligently apply/reapply sunscreen (even on days when I stay indoors!) because PIH will not go away without sun protection!!! The sun will just set those marks deeper into your skin! So always use sunscreen! But that being said, even though I used sunscreen before buying this product, I notice a huge difference in my dark spots clearing up now that I use this serum. Yes, it does smell pretty bad but the results are worth putting up with the smell!!

reviews.review_title: Stinks and it broke me out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Days after using this product I broke out, especially around my mouth and forehead. I’m diligent about introducing new skin care one product at a time, so it’s safe to assume that this was the likely cause. After smelling the awful scent I was actually excited because I thought its lack of added fragrance would be non-irritating. I really wanted to like this project and was so hopeful that it would be a staple in my routine because it has so many active ingredients that I love separately. I gave it 2 stars only because I like the idea behind it and can imagine it works well for those whose skin can tolerate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff stinks. Oh it's bad BUT this stuff works great! Almost 49 and it had faded mu dark spots so much! After 1 month my sunspots faded ! I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product, I even made sure to take before photos so I could make a good review. I purchased it to help with one dark spot that I have, and after 1 month of use I’ve barely seen much difference. I’ll be fair and say that it has helped, but not at the rate I thought it would after using it for 1 month straight twice a day. I’ve used products before that have worked much better, for spots that were much darker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finished the product, used it everyday and it did absolutely nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I would’ve returned this. It smells bad and it never seeps into my skin. It’s greasy, smelly and didn’t show any results. What a waste. I used it ever other night and never had any results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There aren’t enough kind words to describe how much of a game changer this product has been for me. I get freckles are “in” now, but mine come with melasma which is less cute. I wear mineral sunblock religiously and keep my skin cool (which I recently learned, hot skin aggregates melasma) but this product helped even everything out on my cheekbones like nothing else ever has. I barely have to use any product, just a dab and then tap it into my skin. I’ve had it for about 3 weeks and noticed a difference after even a couple of days of first using it. Honestly haven’t noticed a smell and wouldn’t have known until I read the comment section. I have other skincare that smells nice so maybe it gets covered up? But even if I did find it smelled bad, the results are too good to care! I’ve never seen an over the counter product even out and fade my freckles and melasma like this! It’s *like* using 3% hydroquinone except there’s none of that in here!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried three times to put this on and cannot continue because of the bad smell. That awful smell lingers. Is mine just old? I just had to tossed. What a waste of product and money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does work but it leaves behind a greasy film on skin and also smells like chicken…. Would only recommend if you don’t mind looking greasy and smelling like chicken.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does not work. Seen some Photos from reviewers of their before and after using this serum. Thought there was an improvement on their skin stone So i went ahead and give it a try. I have Dark patches on my cheeks and would love for them to fade. After using this serum for a few months, i see no changes. I even took some before and after photos and they look even worst. I gave two stars because the serum feels gentle on skin but other than that, its not working on fading dark patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This a phenomenal product. It takes time for you to see results, a couple of weeks I would say, but it works. It gives you a more even skin tone, it helps with acne marks and dark spots. Start slow once a week and then build up. I really like this product will keep buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Faded Serum for about 3 weeks  (about once a week) and have definitely seen gradual improvement in the dark spots on my face.  I applied the serum directly on the spots with a Q-tip after using my moisturizer.  It works great.  And, the serum does not smell that bad.  I really don't notice the smell.  I am pleased  with this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive only been using this for about 2 weeks and have seen significant improvements! Definitely a staple in my night time routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay guys, this product really works. I have a problem with picking my skin and it causes hyperpigmentation. This product has REALLY been a big help in fading the the old marks as well as new ones as I work on my problem. I use this in the morning with sunscreen, and my prescription retin-A at night. It does not clog my pores and I think it’s helping with dryness a little. Yes, it stinks. Smells like sulfur. But it’s not bad, I really don’t care since it’s a product that works. The smell dissipates after a few minutes especially when you put another product on top of it. If you’re not super sensitive to smell you should be fine.

reviews.review_title: One of the BEST treatments I've tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time purchasing and I will absolutely be buying again! Had to deduct one point for the smell. Honestly...it's not that bad. When it first goes on the skin it has an unpleasant smell but after I rub it into my skin and put moisturizer on top it goes away within seconds. It does not linger. If you stay consistent with it it WILL WORK! Amazing product, great job Topicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works well for me if mixed with a retinoid (which helps dilute it) at night. I’ve replaced my cur*l*gy with this as the actives work well and in synergy. To me it takes commitment and patience, SPF, b3 toner/serum (AM), chemical exfoliation, and retinoids. It has lasted me a while but a mini would be appreciated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product does not work. No lightening of scars was noticed despite daily use with sunscreen, as advised. Additionally, the company in question does not honor their 45 day guarantee.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has palm oil and coconut oil in it which will lead to acne. Probably don’t put that on your skin if you get acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this works, you just have to be consistent and do it regularly! it is a thin consistency, I use it to spot treat dark spots and it is almost too thin for that and would probably be better as an all over serum or if you have larger areas of dark spots. but I do think it has lightened mine!

reviews.review_title: amazing results, awful smell. overall worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Within literal days I have noticed a difference and think this product works amazing. I have combination skin that’s been dry recently with the temp change and breaking out (and consequently scarring) a lot from masking at work. This serum has helped both of those concerns in just a few days!! I give it 4 stars just because of the smell. God, it smells bad like burnt rubber or something which sucks, but not enough to deter me from using this. Also, the price is a little steep but again, that isn’t stopping me from using this and I will likely repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this products before it came to Sephora. I only started using it consistently for the past two months. I’m going to tell you that it is fading slowly but surely my dark spot. I use it every night! Make sure that you don’t use products that contains the same active ingredients at the same time. No niacinamide serums, no acids and always wear SPF 30-50 during the day. My skin is glowing!! The smell doesn’t bother me at all. I fades few minutes If the stickiness bothers you, put a moisturizer on top. later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found out about this product from Twitter (around Nov 2020). Went out and brought it through the website and from Nov 2020 to Feb 2021 I saw instant results. I had a bad breakout on my chin that left tons of acne scars and hyperpigmentation. Consistency is key and with your skin care routine using this it cleared up my jaw line and chin and as well as the rest of my face. I’m looking forward to buying a new tube soon.

reviews.review_title: Try it and see for yourself
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I always speak facts that they call me a fax machine. Anyways. This product seems to also help with shrinking pimples. I can't say anything with scarring yet. I'll probably come back to write another review on red marks/post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation. BUT oh man. This already helps my skin feel softer and smoother. I'm thinking it's the azelaic acid that's really working its magic. Tell me how I used it for only 2 days and my skin feels like a baby's bottom

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works insanely fast. Use it most mornings. The smell is awful, but you get used to it. My esthetician told me I legit had a glow at my monthly facial. Incredible product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really hope this clears my skin I just purchased this 2day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Do not listen to the reviews with bad ratings. Yes, product has a strong odor but have fair skin with dark pigmentation from acne scars all over my face and this product has dramatically reduced their appearance in just one week with consistent use.  Who cares how it smells? Are you going to eat it? The smell immediately fades and it WORKS. I used other high end, expensive serums, and they did not work. I wanted to give up. But this worked. I am blown away and so grateful.   Make sure to use this product on clean, exfoliated skin, AM and PM, for best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone’s skin is different but this truly changed my skin in all the best ways. I saw results and got complements on my skin within weeks of using it. Personally I don’t find the smell too bad - the scent fades within minutes. Make sure you are pairing it with sunscreen though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product. A little bit goes a super long way, I typically just use it as a spot treatment after I’ve picked at my face and I have dark spots. The smell, especially when only used as a spot treatment is super minimal and doesn’t bother me at all. It smells just like nair, but doesn’t linger too much and you can only smell it if you put it right up to your nose. I much prefer this scent to having irritating fragrance in my skincare! It’s made a huge difference in fading my spots

reviews.review_title: Dark skin & nothing works? This will !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a dark skinned, African American female and I have to say I love this product. During the pandemic my acne got pretty bad and I have since cleared it up but I was left with so many acne scars and dark marks. Aside from that, I also had very dark under eye circles. I’ve been using this product on my dark marks and under my eyes for a little over a month now and I see a huge difference. My skin is way more even and a vast majority of my marks have lightened significantly. I promise you I swear by this product. Some people complain about how awful the smell is but in my opinion it’s an over exaggeration. It really isn’t that bad. It’s a slight hint of a smell that doesn’t last long. No you will not be walking around with your face having a smell. Nonetheless I give this a 10/10. 100% worked for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a while now, this one and the discoloration spray one. I get mild break outs usually only around time for my period and it leaves me with scars most of the times that sometimes faded away on its own. I have hyperpigmentation now that I’m getting older so I decided to use both of these products because I heard great things. Well, I’ve been having a not so great experience. My forehead is covered in tiny pimples that are causing more scarring. The smell of the product was never a problem for me but it did leave me feeling sticky and very greasy. Just not for me and I will be returning back sadly. It’s such a cute tube and I really wanted to work but unfortunately I am not a fan. Hopefully it works for whoever is readying this but if not here is a heads up if you experience what I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this because I’d heard such great things. It contains some great ingredients but I bought it without reading the full ingredient list. It contains coconut oil!!! Which is notoriously comedogenic for many people, myself included. Unfortunately I think this did more harm than good for me, even using as a spot treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing!! Been using consistently for 1 month. I have very dark hyperpigmentation on the face, it is slowly working on them. What I’m really impressed by is how quickly it worked on my under arms. I had a severe allergic reaction to a natural deodorant a few years ago which left hyperpigmentation that was almost black on my under arms. I tried home remedies, exfoliating etc. It didn’t budge at all. Used this product on my underarms everyday for two weeks and it has faded SO much! I’m so happy, it was such a insecurity of mine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TBD - still not seeing results after 3 weeks, but also not seeing anything negative...will give it more time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell reminds me of the old home perms from high school. The smell dissipates really fast, so don't let the smell deter you. This stuff works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this or for it to simply just work for me. I initially heard of the brand before it came to Sephora and loved their messaging so I was excited to try it out. I waited until long after I completed the tube to write this review. The initial interaction is the smell, it's very sulphuric smells like a combination of nair and Ambi cream and it doesn't subside I can smell it until I wash it off. I said that I'd deal with the odor by only applying it at night. Unfortunately, the next was not even seeing any results after several weeks of consistent use. I received better results from just using niacinamide and lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using this product for 6 months now and have seen no improvements. do not waste your money and time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Waited until I used the entire tube to write a review.  Kept hoping and hoping that if I stayed consistent I would see results. I used every night and morning, with sunscreen in the morning, and didn’t see one bit of difference on dark spots on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells awful like eggs and nair. It also peels and flakes like crazy but I’m gonna continue using to see any results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but this is one of my favorite products I’ve ever bought. I just purchased this product a second time after my first tube finally ran out (after like 8 months!). I’ve always has an issue with PIH dark spots and this is the only thing I’ve ever used where I can see a notable difference in a short span of time. I use it in the morning and night on targeted areas and I feel way more confident with an even complexion. I’ve been able to simplify my makeup routine and cover up less of my skin (cutting out tinted moisturizer and lots of concealer). Tbh the smell is kinda like sulphuric/rubber to me, and doesn’t smell great, but I much prefer this to a synthetic fragrance that would break me out and defeat the purpose of the product. And I feel secure that the active ingredients are doing their job! The scent throws people off but it doesn’t linger, and the product sinks into my skin pretty quickly. It layers really well into my skincare routine. After using it for almost a year, its really changed my skincare game. I’ll keep buying this as long as it’s made!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Saw a difference after first use with this cream. The reviews are real . I’ve used many creams for intimate areas and had only a little difference after weeks of treatment.  I saw the beginning of results on the first night of use .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got melasma due to pregnancy and I’m finally seeing fading results after adding this to my routine. I do also use a prescription Tretinoin cream, but I didn’t have noticeable results with that until I added the faded cream. As with most skincare, consistency is key with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay sooooo I wish I could have loved this. It’s super trendy and seemed like a great product. But it hasn’t helped my skin at all. Nothing noticeable or great about it. And it smells so weird it makes me not want to put it on. The only redeeming quality is the cute packaging. I would probably not recommend this. Wanted to love if but sorry! Big pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t give 5 stars due to the smell. It’s not a super bad smell. I am seeing my hyperpigmentation gradually fade. This product has the top 3 ingredients that help to fade those spots. The smell can be masked with your moisturizer. I specifically use it at night since I use Azelaic Acid in my daytime routine. Will def be purchasing another tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea if this works. I could not get past the smell. The product description does warn about the sulfur smell so I knew in advance but I couldn’t tolerate it. It was gross and the smell got trapped on my finger tips and nose hairs. No thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried to post a review for this since April and Sephora has not posted. I’ve contacted them and the founder of Topicals. I’m hoping in calling them out they will have to post with the photos.   My son has had dramatic results with this. He is autistic so I’m posting for him. He had terrible marks from acne scars. We’ve tried everything from Dr. Gross to dermatologists… Yes it has a smell but just follow with a moisturizer to neutralize it. I have used it on his skin before bed every single night, no skipping. I started the first week of April and by the one month mark it was pretty dramatic. The after photos are taken after two months of use. The pictures are not altered, at the same time of day, same spot and same light. The marks are so much better. His confidence is amazing as well. I contacted the founder to share how much this helps. So it has an off smell, if my autistic son who has aversions to many things can manage so can you. Just be consistent.   Hopefully they post the photos and the review because if not I’m not going to try again. Don’t be discouraged it works so well for my son!

reviews.review_title: Get Past the Smell! Trust Me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with and order and used it once a week to every other week for about 3 months. It was not until a couple weeks after finishing the sample I noticed my other skincare not working as fast. I use switch between a retinol or a chemical exfoliator each night to lighten/rid of dark post acne marks. This serum really works! The smell is off putting at first -like rotten eggs, a little worse than sulfur face wash or spot treatment- but once I put on my moisturizer you can’t smell it (and I use the Dr Jart Ceramiden or Kiehl’s Ultra Facial Cream, both un scented). I have purchased the full size and will continue to use it once a week with my other products until they run out and use it more often if my skin can handle it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: How can anyone put this on their faces. the smell of this is so over powering and horrific. It's exactly like rotten egg. Is this a joke? once it's not the face, it doesn't even fade, so you get to smell like rotten egg all day. who cares if you have no spots if you have to walking around smelling like rotten eggs?! No one will look at your face when they smell you from a mile away. who's giving all these positive reviews?! do they not smell what I'm smelling? I lost some sense of smell from covid, but I can still smell this, and it is bad.

reviews.review_title: don’t let the smell deter you!! HG product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this might actually be my new HG to deal with stubborn acne scars/redness. don’t get me wrong- there is a smell of burnt rubber BUT it doesn’t linger and disappears when i put on my moisturizer. i use it at night and wear sunscreen religiously during the day and my skin quickly goes from stubborn, persistent redness from fresh acne scars to smooth and scar-free. highly, highly recommend even as a spot treatment!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this, and am putting it on my face for the first time today. If this can fade my dark marks on my face I can probably overlook the terrible smell this product has, because let me tell you, it’s not a pleasant smell at all. Quite gross actually. Could be due to what’s in it, nevertheless, if  it works, I can get over it. We shall see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff works, but the smell is so bad like boiled peanuts or something. I had to throw it out after while because I could not continue taking the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is borderline a must try in my opinion if you struggle with hyperpigmentation - both PIE and PIH.   I mainly deal with deep red marks, with very fair skin, and many “hyperpigmentation” products don’t address that concern.   This is very gentle, and works so well. I have very tolerant skin, and I’m able to use this morning and night.   There is an intense smell, yes like burnt hair or nair, but it fades so quickly. It’s a total non issue for me given how WONDERFUL the results are.   I’d say about one month in, paired with diligent SPF and like butter, my red marks are about 50% better. In one month!   The supply lasts a long time too, you only need a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only been using this product for 2 weeks, and have already seen a tremendous difference. I had a dark spot on my forehead from an old superficial burn that’s now practically gone and all the dark spots on the side of my face from picking at acne are SUPER FADED. I’m so happy with my results, I could care less about the smell of the product. The smell is most comparable to sulfur/eggs, but it goes away quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is magic! I tried good molecules discoloration serum and nothing... but used this for a month and saw amazing results. its been nearly 3 months and my scars are nearly gone. amazing product but does smell bad.

reviews.review_title: Stinks for a bit but DANG it works.
reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: -The price for the amount is very fair. I've seen 0.5 oz spot treatments/ serums going for 10-$15, and this would break down to about 10.6 if this were 0.5 oz. I've had the tiny tubes of spot treatment last a few months of use, and this is 3 times the amount so it's gonna last a while.  -The ingredients list is freakin amazinggg. You can find lists with breakdowns of their highlighted ingredients, but they don't usually share the non-highlighted ones even though they're freakin star ingredients too lol. I guess it's too much to list every ingredient and how great they are.  -Topicals says the smell is from the sulfur group on the glutathione. When you pop this baby open it's so surprising and kinda awful. Not exactly like sulfur you'd find in a product with colloidal sulfur because different formulas, and not at all like rotten eggs. It's really unique and, if you haven't smelled glutathione before, a little shocking. Smell fades after 5-10 minutes for me, so it's tolerable, especially after you use it a few times and get a little more used to the smell.  -This works great for PIH and any other hyperpigmentation you might have (Not sure about fading- uneven tans yet since I haven't slathered my arms in this, but I'd love if it did). I get a couple pimples when it's that time of the month and usually the pigment lasts for 2-3 weeks. This time, it only lasted a week and I was ecstatic. It's also been helping to fade hyperpigmentation of some miscellaneous pigmented scars I've had for months now.  -There are exfoliating acids so be aware of that (helps it be a great spot treatment, but may irritate ya). I have hearty skin so I haven't had issues using my usual heavy active routine, but something to keep in mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a trial size of this product and after using for just 2 weeks, I’ve seen a difference in my skin. Dark spots have faded by a considerable amount. Only thing is the smell. If you’re anti fragrance, this product will make you reconsider that. It straight up smells like rotten eggs. For me, the smell disappears completely after 10 ish minutes. After using it for some time, you get use to the smell. Despite this, I think the benefits outweigh the cons and I would recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried every hyped up Vitamin C treatment on the market over the past 5 years to address hyperpigmentation, and none of them had the noticeable impact that Topicals Faded did in just 3 uses so far.  This stuff is amazing. I have no idea why this has been so effective but I'm a customer for life now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is so amazing that I have back ups of it! I can’t see myself without this. Helps fade my dark spots and discolouration so much faster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Please listen to the smelly reviews. If you don't want your entire face smelling like burnt Nair hair & rotten eggs, then don't use this. I badly needed something that works, which this seems to do so by the reviews, but the smell, yall...its not something you can just wash afterwards. It lingers and lingers.   Whoever claims it's not that bad must not mind stinky things. Even my husband asked what the smell was....yuck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product got rid of my acne scars in 3 weeks. I also have melasma, which it lighten the spot, but did not got rid of it completely. I only use it at night. A little goes a long way, so the tube will last you forever. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am seeing subtle results on my melasma and hyperpigmentation after a few weeks of use, and expect progress to continue. You get a lot for your money in this tube, a little bit goes a long way.  I did start slowly as recommended, and did not get irritation. A draw back is that it smells kind of rotten, and I find the scent lingers for quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works pretty well on my acne Combo skin, I get a lot of milia on my under my eyes and when they are extracted leave little freckles. This has helped fade them but it smells like melted rubber so the experience isn’t super pleasant. I don’t use lots of fragrance on my skin but the overall smell is something you have to deal with if I want to use the product. Also its thicker so be sure to apply serums on wet face prior or it will pill them all off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Miracle serum! I got a sample of this product and it's lasted quite some time. Enough for a few weeks of using a pea size 3x/week. My skin looked brighter after one use and it significantly reduced my hyperpigmentation and breakouts within a few weeks. Very impressed and will buy the full-size when it's back in stock! I noticed some people complained about the smell, but it hasn't bothered me whatsoever. I actually try to avoid putting fragrance/perfume on my face, so I'm happy with the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! The texture of my skin has completely changed for the better. I am oily with some acne scars and dark spots from tanning. This has changed my skin. I highly recommend this. It is thicker so I only use it at night but I have seen the change that I was hoping for in my skin. It doesn’t smell great but the smell is gone within a few minutes. This is a must have for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product worked a lot in the beginning and easily helped to reduce acne and lessen some acne scars. Some people noted that it smells like rotten eggs, but it smells more like drain cleaner fluid. It dissipates quickly and is not an issue (I’m looking for product effectiveness). I have two main issues with this product. Number one, it causes acne on the jawline. I believe it is due to shea butter being one of the main ingredients. It causes clogged pores and pimples that are hard to remove. The company should consider removing or replacing this ingredient, because it is too thick for wear (to note, I have medium/olive combo skin, and I used only a half pea size/tiny dab at night). The second issue is that it just stops working after a while and does not fully fix acne scars. Although it helps to decrease and fade them, months later, they are still there. Even with concealer you will see them. They are just flat, red and prominent. There are lots of products that fade imperfections to almost obscurity, but this is not one. In my opinion, it works better for acne than scarring. For reference, I have medium/olive combo skin that is not generally acne-prone (I only had this issue during lockdown). I got a generous 10ml sample size from Sephora as a promo with purchase, but I would not purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been seeing this stuff all over Tiktok so much that I had to buy it. It’s not in store so I had to buy it online. I like how it comes in tube rather then a bottle.  First time using it- stinks so bad, reminds me of nair but it does work I do see some improvement which I’m happy about and it’s only been a few days.

reviews.review_title: works like a charm! one downside…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin look bangin! Makes my face smell… not so bangin… if there is anyway for the manufacturers to tweak the scent of this formula to make it less pungent or a lil less “sulphur-burpy” I’d give it 5 stars! Lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It works for me, but then again I am using this after finishing off a tube of PTR Pro strength niacinamide discoloration cream, so take that with a grain of salt. It is stinky and I absolutely cannot put it on my face unless I only breathe through my mouth. Whoever said the smell dissipates after a few mins, bravo to you, but I can still detect it  half an hour later. I found that it helps to thoroughly wash the product off my hands after I am done applying, and never apply it anywhere near my nostrils unless I want to be smelling rotten eggs all night. I would try Regimen Labs but I like using products that come in tubes so I can tell how much is left. Might switch back to PTR when I am done because that one did not smell at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can tolerate the smell, and the weird texture that doesn’t really absorb, but after months of daily use, it has done nothing for my melasma. The search for something that works continues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never been better than it is now that I have incorporated this into my routine (every other morning in place of vit C). 20/10 cannot recommend enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m giving this 2 stars because I couldn’t use it enough due to the stench. It says Sulpur….no. It’s like gravy. Bad gravy smell. I would adore a sulphuric smell rather than this. Wish I could’ve used it more! Please change this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this when it first came out last year and have repurchased it twice. Had high hopes but honestly have not seen a huge difference. I used the PC azaelic acid and had better results in one week vs the year I’ve been using faded. Probably will not repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using for almost 3 months and have saw no significant change. The smell is not that bad it is reminiscent of Beauty supply tube cream skin lightener and this is basically what that is. Just over priced and no hydroquinone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write a review but this product is everything! I don’t think I will ever have bought it and this is such a shame because it’s amazing! I got it as a sample i header hyper pigmentation from too aggressive micro needling, I tried many things to try and solve it (lasers too) and this has cured it like a magic in a month! Amazing. I ordered the full Size and the mask too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great Product! It really has made my skin brighter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't recommend this enough. You have to start off with one night a week, using less than a pea sized amount for your whole face, with a good moisturizer on top. Now I use it 3x a week. It's strong, but it gets the job done. I haven't had any irritation because I hold off when my skin isn't feeling it. I mostly love the texture my skin has the next day, but it does help with darkened acne scars too. My complexion is definitely more even now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so this is super honest and yes I meant a 5 star review.   This product SMELLS so bad. Like sulfur batteries and burning hair. All mixed. It’s gross. Like scrub your hands afterward bad.   HOWEVER as a super pale hormonal cystic acne haver I’m impressed with this. After 1 use I saw smoothness and radiance coming through active cysts calmed overnight and my redness is down. My skin feels hydrated and calm. I will update this in a few weeks but for now this is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was SO excited to get this product. I have mild melasma, sensitive skin, and really dark spots from my acne but my god, this stuff is AWFUL. I truly do not understand the hype. The texture is SO weird and it made me break out SO bad. HARD NO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Normally I hate when people leave bad reviews only because of the smell, but this stuff is so rank I just can’t put it on my face. You smell rotten eggs for the next hour. I would literally rather have my acne scars or at least use something else even if it wasn’t as effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product. after months of consistent use it hasn’t done a thing for my melasma. Gave it 3 instead of 2 because it mildly lightened an acne scar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took about a month for me to see expected results but only two days to feel the effects on my skin. The ingredients allowed me to use while breastfeeding. Skin is smoothing out and looking really pretty. Thankful for this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought into the hype lol Worked this into my skincare routine and did nothing for me after two months, the smell isn’t that bad

reviews.review_title: Will be adding to skincare routine!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a chemical peel I had irritation and hyperpigmentation at the corners of my mouth. I was lucky to purchase this product since it is frequently out of stock. WOW!! This was a lifesaver. While it is still working on some of my deeper/older hyperpigmentation spots on my face. The discoloration at the corners of my mouth are practically gone after less than 2 months. Will be keeping this as a staple in my skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly don’t understand all the rave reviews. This product did nothing for my dark spots and discoloration. Maybe it is just my skin but this did absolutely nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have stubborn red acne scars on my face and the product didn’t really budge with the scars on my face so i put it on my back and just WOW. I get annoying body acne, specifically bacne and no matter how hard i try it won’t go away but this has helped the marks on my back fade better than any product i’ve used—and i’ve used A LOT to try to treat it. Still not fully clear but has lightened up a lot. i gave 4 stars just because it didn’t work tht much for my face like i hoped but amazing for my body acne that i’ve been struggling to treat for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for months with literally no results. It actually broke me out a few times. Really great ingredients for fighting hyperpigmentation but something is up with the formulation probably because it just did not deliver.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product as it was sold out all the time. I don’t understand what the hype is, save your money, better results using Differing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product made me break out very badly. I do not have acne prone skin but this blew my face up. I was pretty disappointed because a product meant to lighten acne marks only created more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has helped fade my dark spots so much, within a week they were gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily acne prone skin and as a Black girl my acne leaves me with very stubborn hyperpigmentation. I fell into they hype and bought this product thinking it would help but it only made my acne worse. This product is thick, it stinks, and the shea butter in this product made my acne flare up which caused.. thats right more dark marks than ever before. Save your money do not fall into the hype like I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Made me breakout and hard to incorporate into a routines

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't say anything bad about this serum!  I have used a lot of different products to try to fade both old and new hyperpigmentation marks. This is one of the first things that has worked! I saw results fairly quickly, and my dark spots are improving more and more every week. I began using it just once a week then upped it to three times, then five, as the instructions on their site said to gradually increase the use to your desired routine. I will definitely keep this in my rotation. It has a nice consistency, goes on smooth, doesn't pill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A really good blend of tyrosinase inhibitors. The new formulation smells less potent and the texture is comparable to a paste that needs a bit of rubbing in. Def faded my PIH from breakouts in a very short time. The only con is that it feels heavy on my skin, so I only use it at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this treatment!  It smells funky but once you put your face cream on top you don’t smell it anymore and the results are fabulous!  I’ve only been using it for a few weeks and my dark spots have  already faded!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Fast and amazing results on my acne scars from 20 years ago. Will continue to use. Smell is not that bad.

reviews.review_title: Results in just a few days!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the sample 10ml size and I’m glad I did. I didn’t know if it was worth the full size, so I saw it available on Sephora for samples and thought I might as well try it. I am going to go and get the full one asap!! I have a lot of post-inflammatory acne scars and HP, I’ve only been using this lightly for 3 days and I see a difference, I can't imagine how good my skin will look in a month. I also have very acne-prone skin and have not broken out from it.  the smell isn’t bad, it goes away once it’s on your skin and you put your moisturizer overtop. I don’t think the smell should be a deal-breaker either, it seems like the natural ingredients give it this smell so I am not bothered at all. the product has a clean ingredient list and I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good!! It definitely helps reduce my redness after picking at my acne as well as existing hyperpigmentation. It does smell a little funny but it’s a bearable smell and not bothersome at all. Will def be repurchasing after I run out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a licensed esthi and I got this as a sample to try out cause I’m a sucker for good packaging.   The Pros:  It works on KP!  It works on hyperpigmentation!  It works to even out skin tone!   The Cons:  It smells very, very awful. Kind of like perm solution?   Overall I like this and would recommend it, just be weary of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1. Used for 3 months and saw no difference in hyperpigmentation.  2. Does not absorb well into the skin. 3. The smell is uninviting. I too fell into the hype. All of the positive reviews and the constant selling out of the product persuaded me into thinking this product could be the one, unfortunately it was not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a trial and I am amazed at how well this has worked on my scars. It’s only been a few weeks or so and I’ve seen definite results. I get blind pimples (big pimples under the skin; like a little lump) and sometimes go at them.. (no good I know!) but this has been a miracle on my scar. It’s crazy! Going to definitely buy another when the trial runs out.   You don’t need to put a lot, just spot and dot it on. I put it in after my whole skincare stuff (idk if that’s the right way, but I don’t wanna rub the product into my skin rather than be saturated in that one spot.   In my skincare I also use: Hylauronic Acid Niacinamide  Vitamin B  Lactic Acids Retinol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got quite a bad cut on my cheek bone under my eye and when the scab healed it it left behind a quite noticeable dark mark. Since it was in a pretty prominent spot right on my face I kinda freaked out lol so I bought this hoping it would help and I really think it did! The pic shows before and after a little over 6 weeks of daily use. I used it at least once a day but sometimes morning and night. I have sensitive skin so I used it AFTER my moisturizer and lemme tell ya that might be my new secret to success- using actives on top of moisturizer cuz u still get all the benefits with none of the irritation!   This has kinda an interesting texture it’s a cream but somehow kinda stringy? Idk how to describe it but it wasn’t unpleasant to use at all. Also it’s gonna last foreverrrrr I use about half a pea sized each time and the tube looks like it basically hasn’t been used.   It is quite pricey (for me anyways) but since hyperpigmentation was definitely my #1 concern I’m fine spending money to help fix it.   If you have hyperpigmentation left behind by cuts/acne etc. I would recommend giving this a go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally smells like onions. The second I put it on my skin all I can smell is this gross sulphur/onion smell. I am so disappointed, thankfully this was just a points sample. Won't be buying the full size ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know the smell is very off putting, so it does smell like rotten eggs or Nair. HOWEVER, real talk about this product. I was constantly picking at coarse, ingrown hairs above the corners of my mouth, which has left scars. Also, I have a small area of brown spots on the side of my face from sun exposure and not using sunscreen on my face in my teens/20s/mid-30s. So concealer has been my go-to product. I’ve read about Faded Topicals and ordered two tubes, hoping for the best. I was hesitant, but didn’t care for the initial smell. After messaging the product in (20 min after my serum, before moisturizer), I noticed in a few weeks of using Faded a much glowier looking me! I also noticed the scars from my obsessive picking had reduced (not by too much, but I’ve noticed a difference) and my brown spots had lightened significantly. AND! I’ve also incorporated a facial sunscreen with SPF & hyaluronic acid daily to my rotation.  I started Faded 2-3 times a week and now I’m gradually using 4x/week and on those days off, I’m using The Ordinary AHA BHA peel and Weleda Skin Food Light (both are an inexpensive godsend!) I’m still on my first tube, as you only need a pea-sized amount for your whole face. I’ve read that you can use as a spot treatment, but I prefer to put it all over my face and I really love the results so far. Add a tube or two (or four?) in that shopping cart, as they sell out fast!! The pandemic has taught me a lot about self care, so this my friends, is IT. Let’s get Faded together!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this after all the good reviews. I started using every few days and now I'm up to everyday. I've been using it each night for a month and I've seen zero changes in my hyperpigmentation/uneven skin tone. I really thought this would work because it's always sold out. I'll use it, but I regret buying it. Kinda smells weird, too.

reviews.review_title: Best thing for Post- inflammatory Hyperpigmention
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been dealing with hyperpigmentation and pitted acne scarring for about 10 years now and this has by far the only product that has remotely helped lighten the pigment on skin. After so many years, I feel comfortable in my skin again. Yes the smell is really bad but if you can get past that, I swear you won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: unfortunately, I'm a super taster so it smells like new rubber tires mixed with rotten eggs and it lasts all day, doesn't go away. But I noticed improvement in my uneven complexion after two uses soo... get a sample size and try it, start slow, you won't be disappointed... if you can hold your breath, bleh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
