reviews.review_text: This is great stuff. I highly recommend this. I got this as a promotion in the 10ml size and I would definitely buy this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does what it says it will do. Wearing a mask has caused me to break out and leaving my face with blemishes. But a friend recommended I give this a try and I’m glad I did. I’ve only been using it for a few weeks and my blemishes are disappearing with each use. I especially like the fact that I don’t have to wear make up as much to cover up my scars. It’s merely a choice now. The smell doesn’t bother me, I care more about the ingredients and results. As long as it continues to fade my marks I’ll continue to recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is not hype. The smell is horrible - smells like Nair or Veet to me -but it's worth it. This product has helped SO much with my terrible, cystic acne scars in only two months of using it (every other day). You only need a little bit so I can easily see this lasting a whole year for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the product about a month ago now so I wanted to wait before writing a real review. So I see no difference in any of my hyperpigmentation and dark spots. Nothing. Lol oh well. It was worth a try the journey continues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the smell is the least of my concerns plus it goes away with time, using this at night has really made a difference with my hyperpigmentation and i will definitely be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: made me breakout, texture is difficult to work with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this after using the Inkey List’s product for hyperpigmentation. While it worked very gradually in the 5 months I had it... I was curious to see if Topicals could do better. It has ingredients that Inkey List did + alpha arbutin. Was hoping the more ingredients targeted for pigmentation, the better?   I’ve had hyperpigmentation for years after a bad spell of hormonal acne when getting off BC (that only getting back on BC fixed). I was left with red/pink marks ALL over my cheeks. Since I have a ton to work with, I could see a noticeable difference after the first few uses! I don’t expect it to work miracles but I do see a noticeable improvement. YES, it smells, but I put it on before bed anyway so it’s not that serious. WEAR SUNSCREEN daily (this is the best way to prevent getting more hyperpigmentation) but especially if you’re gonna use this.    Lastly, if you have dry, sensitive skin or eczema, the duo with Like Butter is the way to go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: FYI it smells like rotten eggs. I can’t get past the terrible smell of this product. How are people able to use it on their face daily as it doesn’t fade quickly. We are talking four hours later and you still can smell it. It’s so off putting. My face doesn’t feel clean when I can smell this product. I feel stupid for falling for the hype around this product. Disappointed in myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell really isn’t bad, the texture is interesting but in a way that saves product because you really only need a small amount to evenly spread on whole face. I used way too much the first time so be mindful of that. I’ve been using for about a month now and worked up to pretty much every night with no irritation and my PIH is visibly lighter as well as new acne not leaving spots as bad as they used to. I would say give it a try, I truly think this helps fade and prevent hyperpigmentation pretty well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this, I have a lot of hyperpigmentation from skin picking and acne. Unfortunately it kept pilling no matter what order I put this in my routine. So I don’t even know if it’s doing anything, since this is a product that takes time to work. I think it will only work if this is the only thing you use after cleansing and wait like two hours to put on a moisturizer. I tried hard to make this work, I’ve waited 30 mins before/after each step before application to see if it would stop pilling but it would not. I’ve used this before/after both water and oil based moisturizers and it still pills. It for sure will not work if you wear makeup over your skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to use this but it broke me out on my face pretty badly. I understand purging can happen but I’ve experienced purging before and this was not it. But if you have KP try this! I used it on my arms out of curiosity and it smoothed things out in one night. So far it’s been a couple of days and it seems to be working really well. The smell is fine, a little strong but nothing too bad. I’m giving it three stars because I feel like it was advertised as a face serum but it does not work well as a serum. Besides breaking me out, it wouldn’t stop pilling. Even with no product, it still pilled. I’m glad that I found another use for it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been struggling with post acne hyperpigmentation for several months now. Just when I thought I had tried everything, I decided to take a leap of faith on this cream and all I have to say is WOW!! I’ve been using this cream every night for the past month and my marks are nearly gone. I personally don’t mind the smell if it’s going to give me promising results. Don’t sleep on this, it’s a holy grail!!

reviews.review_title: Don’t mind the smell, it works!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for about a month now and my dark spots have faded away so much. I’ve had dark spots for a year now and couldn’t get rid of them until I purchased this. I don’t think the smell is that strong. The serum alone barely smells but it does get a weird scent once I slather on any moisturizer. Overall this definitely does what it says, it fades pesky dark spots!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! I don’t understand why people complain about TRULY fragrance free products but then also complain when things contain parfume + essential oils? Can’t win with y’all. Anyways- this is the real deal and all the hype is worth it!!! Used it about 4x and I already a beautiful different in my skin

reviews.review_title: PASS? smell and texture are awful.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells terrible Nd has a terrible texture. Was excited about how packed this “serum” was but it isn’t worth it! So nasty.

reviews.review_title: It's okay for fresh acne spots only
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because it had high reviews and I wanted a more affordable option from the Peter Thomas Roth discoloration treatment. However, I find this works for acne marks that are not too old but it barely does anything for the discoloration on my face and dark spots. I wouldn't say this is a gel like formula because is thicker and stickier. It doesn't blend well, whether rubbing it in or patting it in it just feels sticky and heavy and I've tried using a lot and very little and it still pills. I've tried letting it absorb before continuing with the next products and nothing works for me. This didn't happen with the PTR discoloration treatment which that one is a true gel like texture that thins out as you apply it. The only thing I like about this one is that it does fade the fresh acne spots on my shoulders which it will be the only reason I would purchase it again but will still purchase the PTR one to use exclusively on the face given that it is pricier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an instant holy grail for me. Yes, there is a smell when you apply the product, but it dissipates almost instantly. In my opinion it it worth it for the results. I would rather have a product that actually does what it says as opened to one that is filled with irritating fragrances. This product has revered hyperpigmentation that I have had for YEARS. Please never change!!

reviews.review_title: GET YOUR HANDS ON THIS IF YOU CAN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i honestly think i have the most stubborn hyperpigmentation on this planet. i’ve used the ordinary, origins, kiehls, YOU NAME IT... and i never noticed any big difference on my acne scars. this product however.... wow. i saw noticeable difference within 2 weeks. there is a scent to it but i dont mind it. its my holy grail product now. and you definitely get what you pay for! theres a lotta product in that tube. please sponsor me lollll

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this a couple times, over a week apart, and it burned my skin like a retinol burn. I suppose that means it was doing it’s job, but my unfortunately i can’t continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out after a few days of use but i kept using it ... actually it works but its sad that I had to go through these huge zits before I could see some result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great serum. I have noticed within a few uses that my acne scars are starting to fade. My ONLY problem with this product is the scent. Holy this stinks. I have to make sure to not breathe in while using this. Its very potent and could be off putting for others. Topicals if you are reading this please make this with 0 scent, we beg of you.

reviews.review_title: Broke me out and smells really bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m going to be honest, I really had high hopes for this product. I used it one night and the next day and had 2 new medium sized zits. The smell is like rotten eggs and doesn’t leave your hands and the product doesn’t properly absorb in the skin- it’s super sticky. Disappointed because the reviews seemed real but I’m guessing many might be sponsored or paid to give a positive review. Might work on more tough and mature skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After three weeks of using twice a day, I saw no improvements to my skin or fading of existing hyperpigmentation or acne marks.  I have gotten better results for lightening dark spots from using salicylic acid treatments than I did using this Topicals serum.   It makes me wonder if some of the early reviews for this product are all hype or maybe paid-for and/or fake.  I know that products can sometimes take a month or more of use to see a difference, but I've seen faster and better results with other products.   As far as the smell that other reviewers mentioned, I honestly didn't think it was that bad or that noticeable.   Overall, this serum wasn't worth the money to me and I will be returning the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Major Fan! I’ve only been using this product for about 6 weeks about 2-3x a week and I have seen a major difference. I feel my hyperpigmentation has visibly decreased. I am pleasantly surprised at how quickly it works. The only compliant I’d give is the scent is distinct and not extremely inviting. Nothing strong enough to liner or for others to smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have major sun damage on my chest. I’ve tried lots of different products. After just a week I have seen a noticeable difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works!  I wasn’t ready for the sulfur smell,  but it’s worth it because I saw results in two uses. Another reviewer said if you regularly exfoliate you’ll see faster results and it’s true.  I have sensitive oily eczema prone skin so I use a BHA 3x per week (no physical exfoliating) and with Faded even 2-3x per week I might be able to be makeup optional in a month- if I don’t go crazy on any zits. Definitely works well if you are exfoliating regularly.

reviews.review_title: good, but not as great as hydroquinone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this bc it basically has every anti-melasma ingredient in there. I have been using this for 3 months on my stubborn hyperpigmentation I have on my nose from wearing hot sunglasses over time (PSA, don’t wear hot sunglasses in your car on your face, especially if you’re a woman of color. Heat = hyperpigmentation). Anyways, I’ve successfully lightened my hyperpigmented areas with 2-3% OTC hydroquinone in the past, but I think using that has made my melasma more stubborn to fading long-term. Also, you’re supposed to take breaks from hydroquinone, which is annoying.  Sadly, for me Faded is sadly not as effective as hydroquinone despite me using it twice a day for 3 months.   Since I’m a fan of the ingredients & don’t plan on going back to hydroquinone, I will keep using Faded until I’m done with tube & update. It may just be that my stubborn dark marks need more time with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After 2 weeks using this product - this is a winner.  A few notes.  The product does lighten skin discoloration, dark spots caused by sun and dark spots caused by burn (flat iron incident - a couple of years old and ugly).  I'm going to keep using to see overall impact. I'm impressed by the price too.  I was told that my burn had to be treated with a laser which is not something I wanted to do.   If just to avoid the laser - is a relief.  I use this at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this for a week on nights that I don’t use Tretinoin and can already see results. The cream is very light and didn’t irritate my skin at all because I have very sensitive skin. Also I didn’t find this product has any smell. Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this isn’t a product that will get rid of discoloration overnight but i’ve noticed some of my spots lightening after using for a couple of weeks. i’m not gonna lie though. the smell is a bit off-putting but once you rub it in it starts to go away. it’s non irritating too. i hope i continue to see good results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So far faded has not broken me out and I’ve been using it every night since receiving it in the mail. My hyperpigmentation is slowly starting to fade I think. It’s definitely a slow process but I’m okay with that! The smell honestly does not bother me at all. I don’t think it smells like sulfur or rotten eggs. I mean it does have a smell that I can’t pinpoint, but it’s honestly not that bad lol

reviews.review_title: The results are worth the try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The ingredient list is what initially caught my attention because my god it’s everything you need for evening complexion. After using this for about 3 weeks I’ve noticed such a difference with my PIE and even a reduction in active breakouts. I’ve been dealing with these skin issues for the past year and have tried many products so this product in particular has been a blessing. I tend to use this at night since it doesn’t blend into the skin as nicely with other products. If it weren’t for smell (smells kind of like chicken that’s been sitting in the refrigerator) and the un-blendabililty it would be 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only way to truly get benefits from this product is to wear sunscreen EVERY DAY, as well as reapplying throughout the day. Then you can include faded into your skincare routine. Cleanse, tone, treatment (faded would be here), spf. It may be able to be used day or night, but the best results will most likely come from day use for benefits of antioxidants. Yes it smells super disgusting. Just hold your breath as you apply. After months of use, you will get used to the smell. This didn't just get rid of my hyperpigmentation, but it helps keep my acne (red/inflamed ace) away. I haven't broken out in weeks. If you have dry skin too, try their like butter product. Faded + like butter are my absolute favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is so god awful that I might have to stop using it. I can continue to smell it a long time after application, even after applying a nice smelling face cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *disclaimer- I did not “ease” into using this product, I do have sensitive skin, but I did not have any burning sensation or any side effects from using this product.   Proof is in the pudding! Before and After of only using this product for a week twice per day.   This will always be in my skincare routing!   Does smell like sulphur, rotten eggs, and chicken broth lol! But it does the job well, and the smell dissipates in a few minutes. All in all don’t be sorry you didn’t give it a chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very tolerant skin and have been using this every other night for two weeks now. I can clearly see dark spots and acne marks fading and my skin tone overall looks way more even! I’m not typically sensitive to smells either, but this product kinda reeks. If you’ve ever been to the beach at low tide and it smells like sulfur/something dead/rotting this is a bit like that. It does fade after about half an hour, but if you are sensitive to smells, it might be a good idea to look elsewhere. It definitely works though, so if smell isn’t a big deal go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good for my acne. I haven’t broken out since using.. and i feel like my skin has been more clear. Seeing less breakouts, and my dark spots are lightening slowly but surely. I purchased this at full price and bought another as soon as this went on sale even though i’m not done with my first tube because it sells out SO fast. A forever staple for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only product I have used that has been effective in lightening my hyperpigmentation. I’m olive toned, in my 30s and still get acne. My acne often leaves horrible hyperpigmentation that can last more than a year.   I’ve only been using this product for a week or two and my hyperpigmentation has lightened so much on new and old marks.   I also have a non-acne related hyperpigmentation mark/scar that has been on my body for about 10 years and it is almost gone already!!   Anyone with acne or hyperpigmentation knows how depressing it can be, especially when you have hyperpigmentation on areas that aren’t as easy to cover up with makeup, like your back or chest. The product smells for a few seconds, the scent doesn’t linger in the air or on the skin. It is well worth smelling an unpleasant smell for a few seconds to get rid of marks on your body that lower your self esteem.    I’m so thankful to have found this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Man, I wanted to love this so badly! The ingredients looked BANG-ON and finding an affordable Tranexamic Acid is hard... But something in it broke me out all over my face, but especially in clusters right in the middle of my cheeks.  Now I'm dealing with a whole lot of PIE all over my face and I'm pretty bummed about it.   I'm sending it back... YMMV but still, be aware this can cause breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a few weeks ago after my favorite estheticians were recommending it on Twitter and it is amazing! I have medium-dark skin (Fenty 410) and I have stubborn hyperpigmentation on my face and chest from cystic acne as well as dark inner thighs from chub rub, so I have been using this product to treat both. The dark spots on my face are pretty much gone and the ones on my body are fading drastically! I’ve seen a lot of comments about the smell and I’m so confused. Everyone wants to complain when chemicals don’t smell good but they also complain when fragrance is added to skincare. The product definitely doesn’t smell great but it fades and I also wear fragrance to bed so I hardly notice it. I absolutely love this product and I’m so happy to see it at Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using it for only 3 weeks and I've noticed such a difference in my PIE already!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. Been using it for 3 weeks and I’m starting to see progress. Only thing I don’t like is that it doesn’t absorb quickly and it peels. Asides that I love it. It’s a must buy! It’s nice to see something that actually works for darker skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeeee this serum!!! I’ve literally seen such a massive improvement in the dark marks and hyperpigmentation on my cheeks. I have dry and sensitive skin and this works amazing for me! It has some exfoliating ingredients but it doesn’t feel drying at all. Everyone’s talking about the smell here and it definitely doesn’t smell pleasant but I don’t think it’s that bad.... kinda like a sulfur smell that goes away pretty quickly.  I use this 2x a week at night and mandelic acid 1x a week at night and I’ve seen no irritation at all. Definitely don’t combine this with other exfoliants in the same routine!! I lightly rub this into my skin until it absorbs or else it has a tendency to sit on top of the skin and pill. I can’t imagine my skincare routine without this serum and I’ll repurchase this forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I do see a difference in my skin using this product, but the smell is so bad that I almost Fred using this product. If the smell dissipated after application it would be fine but I can smell it for hours after application. I usually prefer fragrance free products as I have some fragrance sensitivity, but I think this would really benefit from a bit of fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally purchased this directly from Faded only days before Sephora announced that they would be carrying the line.  I ordered it based on hope (and good reviews) I have medium tan coloured skin, used to sunbathe and live for hot hot weather.. without re-applying sunscreen (because I would never burn) And after careless years of neglect, I started to notice brown spots forming on my forehead.  Fast forward years after, and my forehead and cheeks are plagued with melasma.  I’ve tried every peel, every acid, every brightening cream, every serum and every cosmetics procedure that money can buy and nothing worked for me.. some even made it worse.  I’ve researched many factors that cause melasma and a lot are due to my genetics also, but that doesn’t mean that I was going to give up trying everything and anything to help keep my spots from consuming my face (and my confidence) After seeing Susan Yara mention this product, I decided to look it up.. and all the ingredients individually are all amazing in combating hyperpigmentation, but all those in one product, yes please.  I started using 3x and week and it was gentle enough on my sensitive skin, that the next week, I used it 4 times. after 7 times in total I can already see results. I am so happy with this purchase. I can’t wait to see further results the more I use it.  Don’t think about buying this, just do it.. you won’t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING!! I’ll be stocking up as this comes back in stock! I’ve tried sooooo many products and happy I tried this! The smell isn’t strong, people complaining are silly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to deduct a star but... it stank. love the product, only on my 3rd use and i can see a difference. i am glowing!!! but i also stink!!! smells like 2007 when i got my first perm but ima still use it tho, just not when bae around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is worth ever PENNY!! Noticed results in just one day!! Post inflammatory scares are lightning in just 1 week and stops new breakouts from forming. Everything you’ll need! Better than my la Roche-posay benzoyl!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a lot of products that haven’t worked but this one actually does! It still takes a week or two but my acne scars have lightened and has evened out my discoloration on my cheeks. Love this product and happy to support a Black and Asian founded brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only 3 weeks using it for the acne scars on my forehead and chin and its soooo amazing!!! Do not recommend pairing with aha+bha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! You get used to the smell but this alone will really lighten hyperpigmentation. It does take some time, you will need to be patient. However, if you use any weekly retinoids or exfoliating acids you will get faster results. I've been using this since January and noticed a change in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smell is sulfur-y, but not nearly as bad as other sulfur-based acne products. this is a powerhouse for the results-driven skincare user. it pills if you try to pat it or rub it around once it's spread out, so using anything on top doesn't work, and nothing but a thin watery toner is ideal underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t wait to see what amazing things this brand does. The packaging, marketing, models, portion, product..there isn’t anything they didn’t get right! You get a good amount for the price. I especially love that because I wanted the Faded for all body scars. I can’t lie the Faded is a little stinky but that’s better than being masked with harsh fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this a couple months ago before it came to Sephora!! Highly recommend. The hyperpigmentation on my cheeks have faded so much and it makes my skin feel great. Smell isn’t the nicest but who cares! It doesn’t bother me in the slightest and still works like magic.

reviews.review_title: A MUST HAVE FOR ACNE PRONE SKIN!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A Godsend for stubborn acne spots. I couldn't believe that this product did more in one week than months of healing for my stubborn bright pink spots. I had flare-up over wearing n95 masks as a nurse. To my horror my cystic acne came back and I had clusters once again on my face. This product makes me feel and look great. This tube will forever be a holy grail product.

reviews.review_title: CHANGED MY LIFE!! for good, forever.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: CHANGED. MY. LIFE. I have acne & hyperpigmentation (fun eh?). After using as a spot treatment for just 2 weeks, I am a new person. Cannot recommend enough. Compared to other people here, I actually don’t mind the smell at all. It smells like something but it’s not bad at all, I didn’t notice it until someone pointed it out tbh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s been about 3-4 days of using consecutively at night in my skincare routine and I have definitely seen my skin tone even out. For hyperpigmentation I’m aware it will take a bit longer to be able to report back on that but my skin feels smoother and looks more even when I wake up on the morning. It smells like...chicken broth but it dissipates quickly so nothing to worry about. The texture is creamy and very easily blendable over the skin. I just think the ingredients in it are knockouts and great for skin! Happy to have purchased it and would repurchase again! Plus package is cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love this serum so much! def smells a little weird like sulfur but it feels great on the skin and helps fade discolouration

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this cream every day for over a month and seen zero results. I am using it for hyper pigmentation. It has not irritated me but has done nothing so far. Texture is unpleasant so I used it at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This thing works and works quickly! Literally applied every other day (I have dry skin) and saw results in two weeks. It can be slightly drying, so on the days I use it, I up the hydrating products I use. The smell is terrible, but I don’t really care because it works so well to fade scars and hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love faded! Before and after about 5 months in and still in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this product on their website and I love it. A little goes a long way, and I mean loooong. Not the best smell but I learned a long time ago that good smell does not mean good product. This product has done wonders for my acne marks. I pick my pimples (gross I know) and it leaves dark spots all over my face that take months to fade. This has helped fade them in about 2 weeks. I use this at night routine so idk how it works under makeup. It also hasn’t caused my skin to break out so it’s a big plus

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product about a month ago and I have seen tremendous results from it! I’ve used this four times and my dark spots are already almost gone. The smell of this product may not be so pleasant but the results I got from it were absolutely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. You see a difference with just one application. I have so much hyperpigmentation and redness around my upper lip and chin and this has helped so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this product through another company about six months ago and this product has changed my skin forever! When I saw Sephora was now carrying it, I ordered several tubes immediately.   I have old acne scarring on my face from elementary school and it has sat on my face for 35 years. This product literally started healing old acne scarring and now my face is much smoother by probably 40% in just a few months. Texture on my skin is much better and my skin looks much brighter... 80% brighter in four months. I have tried many products on the market and nothing compares and it does not cause more acne or make me break out when use it! This product will change your life and it does exactly what it says! Bye-bye acne scarring and uneven skin tone from old sun damage. Amazing product! I have told all my friends to buy this product. Best skin care purchase in the last year! Make sure you wear sunscreen if you are using this product.

reviews.review_title: This is literally your sign to buy this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Topicals Faded Serum since the start of the pandemic and I can wholeheartedly say that it has completely saved my skin... the fact that this brand is also black owned is an absolute added bonus! Faded will always be apart of my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a MUST have for dark spots and hyperpigmentation! I love that it’s unscented and how clean the ingredients are. Not to mention it’s black owned AND the brand praises NATURAL skin. This will definitely continue to be a staple in my skincare routine ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love  this product!! Had a lot of dark marks and it has helped me so much!! No other products has been as helpful as this one!!! I will buy it every time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is one of the most incredible products that I've ever used- I've been using it in my routine religiously for the past 6 months and it's a miracle worker. Evened out my skin texture and has given me the most beautiful glowing skin tone- it's absolutely incredible. Besides working wonders on my face, I also have surgical scars that I've spent years trying to get rid of (and lots of money on some of the best products) but after literally a few uses, I saw more progress with the coloration of my scarring than I had with any other product. Love love love this and can not recommend it enough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good product. Helpful for my dark marks. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this has the scent of eggs a witch brewed in their cauldron in the 1500’s but it is magical. if u can get past the scent, the product is awesome for hyperpigmentation and discoloration. remember that hyperpigmentation takes a longggg time to get rid of so don’t write a review after trying it for two weeks talking abt how it smells bad and didn’t do anything (fragrance/parfum is overrated and irritating in skincare anyways). 10’s across the board.

reviews.review_title: Huge improvement in my stubborn texture!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for ~2 months and I am a huge fan! I don't have a ton of hyperpigmentation (mostly just when I get a hormonal zit that refuses to go away) but I do tend to have random texture that I just cannot seem to smooth out.   This product has been a game-changer for both issues. My skin has never been smoother, and say goodbye to hormonal acne scars. It also hasn't been too drying for my parched winter skin. I use it ~3x/week at night and alternate with my retinol with one night off for my skin to take a break.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been dealing with constant acne flare-ups, which ultimately lead to dark spots and hyperpigmentation. I also have sensitive skin and easily prone to redness/irritation so i LOVE that this product hasn't caused any breakouts!   At first, I was skeptical since it's all natural ingredients and didn't really think it would work as well as exfoliating chemicals, but tis right here — BAYBEE! YES MA'AM.   I've noticed my dark spots fading just after 2 weeks of consistent use. I've now amped up my usage to 2x a day, everyday in both my morning and night time routines. Be sure to wear sunscreen. Can't wait to purchase my next tube!   Also, more than anything, loving that Topicals is Black-owned. Go girls!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fades acne scars SO fast if you are consistent with it! The scent is definitely something you need to get used to (definitely a strong sulfur scent) but won’t linger for too long after you apply it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love!!!! Use this every night or every other night (when I forget) and it has helped so much. My skin feels so smooth and my dark sports are definitely fading. I had a horrible breakout last summer that left me a lot of scars on my cheek and it’s almost gone! I very rarely write reviews but I promise this product is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product that has honestly helped my dark spots so much! As long as you stay consistent you will definitely see results. would highly reccommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smooths out my texture!!! Noticed the difference after the first day I used it. Also awesome for my dark spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great to fade hyperpigmentation! You’ll see results soon. I use it about 5x a week at night and I give my face a small break those other 2 days to hydrate it more. Don’t hesitate, just buy lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product really does what it set out to do. I’ve been using it for a couple weeks and my complexion has really evened out. I can’t wait to see the results after two months. This will be a staple in my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Kicks hyperpigmentation to the curb and doesn’t dry my ultra dry skin out even more. obsessed with this product. You need this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this twice daily for 6 weeks on a small age spot on my cheek and saw zero improvement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is super lengthy but this is SKINCARE GOLD, a total staple in my routine and a must buy.  since last march when we started masks, i’ve been dealing with “maskne” and the havoc it’s reeked on my chin/upper lip. leaving hyper pigmentation, scars, and uneven texture. i tried so many things to get my skin back to how it used to be, and THIS HAS BEEN A GODSEND!!! my hyper pigmentation is almost if not completely gone, the texture on my skin has IMPROVED SIGNIFICANTLY!! i started in Jan 2021. and it’s now March, and this is a STAPLE in my skincare routine. i use it everyday, if not every other day, after cleansing and before all my water based serums.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a game changer! I can see such a difference after using this regularly and I love the clean ingredients! Definitely fades lasting pigmentation from acne and helps reduce the look of current acne. I really appreciate the honesty and transparency of this company and honestly everything they does so good!!

reviews.review_title: This will KNOCK OUT your dark marks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used a LOT of serums in the past that all sort of helped with fading dark marks, but not like this. FADED has not only faded my dark marks + LONG time acne scarring, but it has also improved my texture and not once disturbed my moisture barrier.  I love love love this product.  *note: I am an affiliate, but I have since purchased more of these for myself AND my family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want your spots to fade without excessive dryness this is the product. I am someone who has used hard spot treatments that made my skin hyper sensitive and didn’t yield results. The first batch scent was a not it but the results are amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Really easy to use and it's really helped fade my dark spots and give me a more overall even complexion. One tube lasts forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product I started to see a difference after the first week of using it! I had a few dark marks on my cheeks and now they are completely gone!! It’s such a great starter to people wanting to get into skincare because it has all the ingredients in one you would want! (I am not wearing any foundation on either photo)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a product that can help manage dark spots, breakouts, hyperpigmentation, and erythema, this serum is *that girl*. This serum contains a powerhouse of ingredients that help brighten dark spots and even out skin discoloration. The formula is gentle enough to be used on the face and body and is also effective enough for me to see results in as little as one month (which is huge considering stubborn spots can take months to fade). The packaging is also fun yet functional because it allows you to use up every single drop. If you're debating to try this, take the plunge, you will not regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After completing my night routine with Faded I noticed a difference in my skin OVERNIGHT!! This product is great for POC as seen below it has reduced the size in my blackheads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I have never used active ingredients until Faded so, naturally I was nervous. But after following @Topicals advice on twitter where they have incredible threads of helpful tips/information on usage, I was ready to test it out. Faded does what it says it does. I started 1x a week on my cheeks to rid hyperpigmentation. I did purge (but again, new to actives) and after 4 weeks I could see a major difference. I now use Faded 2x a week on days I don’t exfoliate with other products. You *absolutely must* wear sunscreen.

reviews.review_title: Amazing for dark spots and PIE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really think this is an amazing product for those who need to tackle hyperpigmentation, dark spots, and texture without wanting to use a bunch of different products. It’s packed with ingredients that are tyronaise inhibitors which help stop over production of melanin that causes hyperpigmentation. Even will all the wonderful treatment ingredients, it still feels gentle on the skin and never irritated my sensitive skin. I like to use this 1/2x a week, but you can increase frequency as your skin adjusts to it. There’s a slight funk in the smell, sulfur like, but it doesn’t linger! SPF is a must with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Faded works FAST. I am a frequent skin picker (and working on it) but I love to use Faded to get rid of the dark spots and hyperpigmentation that seem to linger around forever after a breakout. If you use other exfoliants, I'd keep that to a minimum while using Faded because it has so many exfoliating and brightening ingredients. It has cleared up my hyperpigmentation so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using “faded” for about 2 weeks now and see a dramatic difference! Be aware that consistent and daily use of sunscreen is NECESSARY and that this shouldn’t be mixed with retinols/retinoids. It goes on light and very smooth and easily absorbs into my skin. Chef Kiss!
